misc/groups/children-of-the-umbral-mothe.title: Children of the Umbral Mother
misc/groups/children-of-the-umbral-mothe.description: These followers of Nex Umbra across all her incarnations work to defeat undeath and free souls. They are currently in the most concentration working with the Order of the Pale in Halcystead.

misc/groups/crystalwater-sages.html.title: Crystalwater Sages
misc/groups/crystalwater-sages.html.description: The sages of Crystalwaters have training with the potent crystalline energy of the area, creating a new form of magic.

misc/groups/gang-enforcer.html.title: Gang Enforcer
misc/groups/gang-enforcer.html.description: There are a number similar of organized crime syndicates across Avasoryd, with none particularly standing out above the rest.

misc/groups/gilded-stags.html.title: Gilded Stags
misc/groups/gilded-stags.html.description: Spies who were recruited from the great bard college in the The Great, Holy, and Pious Alliance of Kingdoms

misc/groups/grove-druids.html.title: Grove Druids
misc/groups/grove-druids.html.description: Vinry and Oaky

misc/groups/halikian-farmers-guild.html.title: Halikian Farmers Guild
misc/groups/halikian-farmers-guild.html.description: Followers of Circaea Halikila that move refuges from country to country, typically all the way to Easterglen. The organization also contains a number of farmers who primarily farm, but also assist in transporting and hiding those in need.

misc/groups/hu-family.html.title: Hu Family
misc/groups/hu-family.html.description:
Granny Hu
Granny Hu's Daughter - Zheng Peng
Granny Hu's Son
Hu Lelong

misc/groups/kai-family.html.title: Kai Family
misc/groups/kai-family.html.description: The Kai Family is a family of humans whose ancestors once lived in the Plane of Air serving a great and evil air elemental. His great evil cursed them, causing them to emit sot-like smoke. They aren’t welcome in many other countries and found Bluewall the only place they could live comfortably. Any Sylphs, regardless of ancestry, who manifest this strange miasma are happily adopted into the family. Children born of this family who do not find themselves covered in cloying fog are quickly sent off the island.

misc/groups/maelstrom-family.html.title: Maelstrom Family
misc/groups/maelstrom-family.html.description: Lastly, there are the water dwelling Maelstrom Family. Originally from Levinea , their ancestor fell in love with one of the Nereids who lived near the cursed island. The original ancestor could not bear the curse and got sick often. But the Nereid crafted them a heart shaped amulet that protected them from both the Nereids touch and the curse of the island. When their children were born, they were innately able to withstand the islands‘ curse.

misc/groups/maronda-shipping-company.htm.title: Maronda Shipping Company
misc/groups/maronda-shipping-company.htm.description:
Run by D'Volta Aomar
prev had connections to The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch and Blackfrost

misc/groups/olaf-family.html.title: Olaf Family
misc/groups/olaf-family.html.description: The Olaf Family is descended from a clan of Azoicmound alchemists and brewers. Their ancient founder was accused of plotting against the core tenants of the country and her entire family was to be sent to death. They escaped and fled to the island, willing to risk its curse only to find they were not affected by it.

misc/groups/order-of-the-pale.html.title: Order of the Pale
misc/groups/order-of-the-pale.html.description: Dedicated to stopping the Sanguine Queen of Necromere. Historically a part of The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch and it’s predecessors, these knights branched off and formed their own organization when the Lawful Order failed to take action in around the year 300, allowing the Sanguine Queen to rise to power and destroy a significant portion of Halcystead.

misc/groups/ouh-family.html.title: Ouh Family
misc/groups/ouh-family.html.description: Ba-Ming Ouh

misc/groups/sanguine-queensguard.html.title: Sanguine Queensguard
misc/groups/sanguine-queensguard.html.description: The Sanguine Queen of Necromere hosts an assassin organization. They nominally are her guard, but in actuality take contracts on the lives of others to bring gold back to the Queen.

misc/groups/students-of-the-serene.html.title: Students of the Serene
misc/groups/students-of-the-serene.html.description: Students of Vidrin the Serene in The Grove of Cycles.

misc/groups/tawdrywilde-tamer.html.title: Tawdrywilde Tamer
misc/groups/tawdrywilde-tamer.html.description: It requires great skill to tame the megafauna that the people of Tawdrywilde live alongside. These skilled people are known as Tawdrywilde Tamers.

misc/groups/tehmian'-detectives.html.title: Tehmian' Detectives
misc/groups/tehmian'-detectives.html.description: Based out of the grand city of Tehmia, these detectives investigate crimes against Tehmia’s citizens and the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch.

misc/groups/the-hand-of-the-lawful-patri.title: The Hand of the Lawful Patriarch
misc/groups/the-hand-of-the-lawful-patri.description: Known holders: Rithous Valificus the 3rd
misc/groups/the-hand-of-the-lawful-patri.sourcePath: Misc/Groups/The Hand of the Lawful Patriarch.md

misc/groups/the-raven’s-wings.html.title: The Raven’s Wings
misc/groups/the-raven’s-wings.html.description: The elite guard of The Raven King A specific fighting style passed down by these elite guards. The sword looks like the feathers of a raven, giving it the name Ravenwing Blade or Ravenfeather Sword.

misc/groups/the-swashbuckler-society.htm.title: The Swashbuckler Society
misc/groups/the-swashbuckler-society.htm.description: Formed by Lyldaa the Lucky, this guild of swashbucklers fight ostentatious for the ideals of freedom and good. Physically being able to fight with a rapier on a boat is not important to them, being a member of the Swashbuckler Society is typically more about your heart and your flair for dramatics. They are currently based in Welterglow, although they’ve been banned from the capital trade port.

misc/groups/the-wayfinders.html.title: The Wayfinders
misc/groups/the-wayfinders.html.description: Named after their signature magical compasses, the Wayfinders explore Avasoryd, especially long forgotten places. They focus on collaborating and writing down their findings so that the knowledge they’ve gained won’t be forgotten. They are a theoretically apolitical organization.

misc/groups/venian-knights.html.title: Venian Knights
misc/groups/venian-knights.html.description: A group of knights decided to order above all. Most of them are from The Great, Holy, and Pious Alliance of Kingdoms , Easterglen , and Azoicmound.

misc/eternal-lantern.html.title: Eternal Lantern
misc/eternal-lantern.html.description: This minor artifact is an immobile object gifted to the town of Willowshore by the founder of the Tan Sugi Monastery, Zhi Hui. For the town’s entire history, the Eternal Lantern has stood sentinel near the settlement’s heart, its light never wavering after Zhi Hui placed a few copper coins within it. Some believe that it’s possible to receive blessings from the deities whose shrines stand in Willowshore by placing copper coins within the Eternal Lantern in exchange for additional protection, but for the most part, the people of Willowshore have become used to the ever-burning lantern at the southern steps of Dawnstep Bridge.

misc/puzzle-1.html.title: Puzzle 1
misc/puzzle-1.html.description:
Lucius Valerius: Here's your tea, no don't stand I'll bring it to you. Rest!
Vivian: Ah... thank you. LV: How are you feeling? VV: Tired... I've been so tired, just sitting up in bed makes me winded. LV: Oh... goodness. Do you have any idea what might be the cause? VV: My curse... I think. It takes so long to regain my strength these days. LV: Of course, of course. Well, now that the grimoire has been written, at the very least you can rest for a bit.
VV: I must... show it to Eoghan Lark... he must safekeep it while I am gone. LV: I have.... some terrible news for you. VV: What is it?
LV: Your husband has... fled Grimwood. He's been accused of burning the Sacred Grove. VV: No.... it's not possible. His life force is tied to that grove. LV: He's gone, Vivian, I'm sorry. VV: No.... it can't be... I must... speak with my family now. LV: Of course, I'll help you to the crypt. Would it ease your mind for me to look after the grimoire? VV: No, no, I wouldn't want to burden you. LV: It would be no trouble at all, truly. Where is it now? VV: Safe.... hidden. I must pray to my family now. LV: Of course... let's go.

npcs/former-pcs/sinani/sinani.html.title: Sinani
npcs/former-pcs/sinani/sinani.html.description:
Eidolon: Solace Appearance: 5'11" Shaved, blonde hair Several moles across his face Pale grey eyes Glowing symbol of Nex Umbra on chest when eidolon, Solace, is summoned Home area:
Fallencall God you belong to:
Nex Umbra
The Grove of Cycles, Grove DruidsSPOILERS Notable history (that church knows): Was first seen in public after the necromancer Caius was attacked in his home, resulting in the building nearly burning completely to the ground.
Reports of seeing him (lost and confused, often mistaken for Caius Thaine) went as far as northern Barrenbreak. Put up a Huge Fight when the Church went to capture him, but he begrudgingly settled down when he found out they weren't attacking him. Public religious beliefs: "The Church's beliefs are like, fine, I guess?" says local man who slogged through several old ass books repeating the same story over and over again. He's knowledgable enough about the story that he can discuss with others who fully believe in what the Church believes at length. Private beliefs: The gods may represent different aspects of the world, but they clearly don't intervene where they should. He's still not 100% certain that the gods even actually exist and his Nex Umbra mark isn't just an elaborate setup by some sort of wizard. Time since capture: Roughly 2 years Important family and friends:
Caius Thaine - A necromancer who shares almost the exact same features as Sinani, almost as if they were reflections of each other. 5'11" Blonde hair that falls just below his shoulders Several moles across his face Pale grey eyes Looks like he hasn't seen the sun in weeks Dreams and aspirations: Stopping the rise of necromancy (as someone who has seen a necromancer in action) Expand his (modern) knowledge of the world Stop being put in Caius' shadow/fix the problems he caused Find out what Solace's connection to Nex Umbra is and why he was chosen How old are you: - Physically, like, 25. - Actual is like 2.5 Finally get a chance to rest and really delve into what his new meaning for existence is. He wants to understand why Solace came to him with the mark from Nex Umbra. He wants to learn more about the world, more than what would be found in largely outdated books. What would your character be doing if they were not on this adventure? Likely trying to rally the people from under Caius to deal with him/his lackies. Probably wouldn't go very well due to the Sharing The Same Face situation, but, hey, most people haven't seen Caius face to face before! Why aren't they doing that now? It's better with friends and not endangering the general population :) Where are they from? Fallencall Who were they to the community they were from?
Caius's body double, somebody not needed until the Worst Possible Outcome happened to the Blackfrost. Who is their closest person? Where is that person right now?
A young elven woman named Rima Dahast was the first person who helped him in the Church. As a cleric of Aos Baia, she was quite kind in introducing him into the Church and answered any questions he had. He's not entirely sure what she's been up to, but presumably she's still with the Chuch. What’s the most impactful moment in your characters life so far? Meeting Solace! :3 Escaping Caius and seeing the Real World and how it's drastically different than what he was led to believe, only to be snatched back up by the Church. Learning about the Blackfrost plague and the people dying to it. What’s your characters goal? Stopping Caius and preventing the spread of the Blackfrost and finding out why he was chosen by Nex Umbra. What do you, as a player, want to get out of playing this character narratively? I wanted to play a character who's able to settle into his own skin and create a name for himself rather than be in someone else's shadow. I really like the concept of the "twin" of such an evil guy is actively going against him despite unintentionally taking advantage of the fact that they share a face to do so. I also really want to learn more about what the mirror realm entails and why the FUCK they are sending these beasts to fight these reflections. What do you, as a player, want to get out of this character from a mechanical/gameplay perspective? Big big dammy from Solace, while still being able to cast spells. :3 I like the concept of kind of being the martial and the support caster all in one From a story perspective, why is your character the class they are? Why aren’t they any other class? Due to being "born" from a reflection, he wasn't able to defeat Solace and instead accepted this strange mirror beast as his summons. How do your highest skills reflect your characters personality? Arcana due to essentially being a wizard's apprentice for a little while, and has since tried to absorb as much information on the magical arts to try and understand what the FUCK is going on in the world magically Athletics is from having to fucking BOOK IT whenever there had been the chance he was gonna get snatched up, and is now like. Okay. I guess I should actually try to not let them grab me like that again Intimidation is due to the fear the Blackfrost puts into people, which he's using by, yknow, sharing his face Describe your characters moral or ethical beliefs. What would have to happen for them to go against their morals? The dead shouldn't be desecrated, especially if they're normal people caught in the crossfire of stronger adventurers. (Korkau has been REALLY pushing this for him. Very uncomfortable with their Dead Snatching.) Lying & hiding the truth is okay, unless it actively puts others in immediate danger. Murder under self-defense is fine, but if you're just killing to kill you're not really... going to be on his good side. Magic is power. Those who have magic should be trying to help those who don't, and if you're not, you should have a good reason. His friends or innocents would have to have be being threatened for him to go against his morals. However, he's quicker to cave if his own life is directly on the chopping block. He still wants to live. He wants to learn and grow. Would Sin ever consider changing their face? Honestly? Yes. If given the chance, he's have his face changed permanently so he doesn't have to face the comparisons to Caius ever again. Who were they to the community when they traveled? The odd guy with a giant tiger who, despite it, shrunk away from strangers at first. Eventually, he did open up to those who probed a bit, and he was more than willing to help out when needed. Never stuck around long, though, and did seem to be looking over his shoulder at any possible moment as if he was worried he was being watched. Where did they travel before the church got them? As far south as the northernmost tip of the Lunahelm Raiders. Without a map or worldly experience, it's kind of hard to get anywhere, really. Which, in hindsight, is probably for the best since he probably wouldn't have been a good fit there. Tell me about your time as a wizards apprentice He was overseen as he was taught how to work on cadavers by various Blackfrost workers. Elbows deep in rotting carcasses, only to later see them mindlessly walking to the Blackfrosts' orders. He was terrible at the actual raising part of necromancy, which was definitely... not ideal, but not the worst; at least he had some magical ability. He couldn't imagine what they would have had him do if he didn't have Solace. What happened before you escaped? He tried to learn about the world as much as he could. Half of the information went right over his head, but when he wasn't being forced into doing anything, he was sneaking books, or speaking with Solace, or probing the Blackfrost lackies for information. How did you escape? He took full advantage of the attack to hide Solace and sneak away in the heat of the moment. Stolen cloak and knife, the dark of night, and wandering blindly until he found a passage that was probably supposed to be under guard and he was... out. It shocked him, too. He spent all night running away until he hid in some poor family's barn to sleep. He couldn't shake the feeling that they let him escape but... he's yet to find proof of tht. Did you get to know any members of the Blackfrost? Very few Blackfrost members actually treated him more than some soulless husk for Lord Caius. Some were mean when he asked questions. Some were nice. The very, very few actually pitied him into speaking with him like a human being. The closest he got to know was a halfling called Len. He's not sure if that was a nickname or his actual name, but Len treated him the most like a person. That doesn't mean he was treated well, but he was still treated like he had thoughts and opinions outside of Caius's own. Len was there because he was promised sanctuary from local law if he helped Lord Caius. Sinani managed to gleam that he did something quite bad but Len never let slip what exactly he did. What’s the worst thing sin would do to survive?
Give up Solace, part of his soul, even it hurt him in the end (and by god it would hurt both of them). Go back to the Blackfrost, if things went truly to hell. Would sin get rid of sol if given the chance? Probably not unless he had very good reason to. Sinani's gotten pretty attached to Solace, even despite the "magically attached to his soul" part.

npcs/former-pcs/cecylia.html.title: Cecylia
npcs/former-pcs/cecylia.html.description:
19 Birthday: 22nd of Baiary, 618SPOILERS Where are they from?
She's a runaway from a small farming community called Bredani in south east Fallencall. She was never a farmer, and she was never that good in the arcane magics, so her and her collection of trinkets and doodads were never... appreciated, she thought. Who were they to the community they were from? The little kid who'd rather dig through junk than help out. She's sweet, yeah, but you have to drag her out of the house and physically put her in the field to get her to do anything and even then she obviously hates doing it. She's basically just a child, and now she's run away. With Idris, she was just chatty little sidekick that followed him around and seemed to get on his nerves. Who is their closest person? Where is that person right now?
Idris Lanthorn. He took her in and taught her what he knew for the tools of the trade after she tried to scam him on a piece of junk she found that she knew was worth nothing. He's... well. You know where.
Lilika Naas. She's a gnomish woman that Cyl met in her brief time in Welterglow, who had actually spent time in the Swashbuckler Society before taking a small break to be on land. She taught Cyl the bare beginnings of the bardic craft, which she took to like a fish in water. What’s the most impactful moment in your characters life so far? The first week of actually living on her own, she hadn't realized how hard it would be. She'd expected it to be hard, but not this hard. One night, she had set up camp, sat down, and just started crying. She missed home, she missed people so bad, and she was this close to packing things back up and heading there. But after she stopped sniffling, she shook her head and promised herself that she'd be okay. That she was going to make her own home somewhere, she'd make friends and her own family, and she'll be okay. What’s your characters goal? Helping those who have been affected by the wizards and protecting them from being hurt once again. Bringing Idris back. What do you, as a player, want to get out of playing this character narratively? Learning that she has to actually 'grow up' and realize that she doesn't have to take every little thing on herself. That she can be strong, but she doesn't have to be if there are those willing to help. What do you, as a player, want to get out of this character from a mechanical/gameplay perspective? :woozy: Other people not dying. From a story perspective, why is your character the class they are? Why aren’t they any other class? She's no thaumaturge, but she does learn how to take advantage of her voice and knowledge as much as she can. She learnt fighting styles from Idris, and how to properly hold a knife, but she How do your highest skills reflect your characters personality? Learning from Idris, she's taken her charismatic personality and pushed it further. She's diplomatic, she's deceptive, and of course she can perform. Living on her own, she's been forced to learn how to subsist on the natural world. How does your character view themself? How do others view your character? She thinks she's... okay? She tries really hard! She's doing her best! But she's just... okay. Chatty, pushy, but overall a nice kid. Needs to figure out what she wants to do in life; she has so many years ahead of her. Describe your characters moral or ethical beliefs. What would have to happen for them to go against their morals? Edicts: Take the Long Road: Take a long-term perspective in all aspects of life. Uncover the hidden value of every trinket. Anathemas: Forsake Collaboration: Disdaining teamwork, refusing to learn from others, or acting solely for individual glory. Judge worth by surface shine. Rely on others to fight your battles Those she trusted abandon her, they refuse to help her in the resurrection of Idris, or they actively hurt her after she has helped them.

npcs/seasons-of-ghosts-npcs/matsuki-shou.description: The man that Willowshore calls “Old” Matsuki (male human carpenter) once apprenticed to the head carpenter of the Tan Sugi Monastery. After taking leave from his master, he led his family to construct a large Tian-shu/Minkaian estate to house all two dozen of them. Reportedly, the superstitious patriarch then made sure that the outer walls were whitewashed with limestone containing blessed salts and holy water. Today, Old Matsuki is the most influential of Willowshore’s Southbank faction and serves as the faction’s spokesman.

awoken by druid who came from the tree Elowan shes here to break us out
shes from The Sisters of Primordial Chaos make a plan where shes a dragon and makes it look like we got kidnapped and we sneak out we do a lot of skill challenges go to the cart go to a really cool clearing with a teleportation circle take a rest while theyre casting the spell a bunch of magic cats attack us
theyre being controlled by a man who wants to build a cabin Lucas Judkins so we beat them up and then free from from the spells they jump into the pool and go home their lord gives us a little gift for helping :) Rewards Granted 237 gold Wounding Rune Frost Rune Mistform Elixir (Moderate) Jade Bauble

our first task was to escort a kid up a hill without her getting hit to appease the last chosen of Aos Baia rest beat ppl up to escort her ahaha funky vibes and memory (pinterest board) second was cross bridge roguefully again more funky vibes and memories cave
figure of former chosen of astutia & corpse (kind of? still looks good?) change his hanfu so its appropriate for the dead he sucked the life out of Odhrán and came to life
told us that 春魅 was his lover and was betrayed via summoning circle being sabotaged needed to know if we were strong enough if an ally betrayed us ok rest here for now tho, undead next room hes gonna fix up odhran

hag of the Blackfrost recognizes sinani, thinks he's the Blackfrost lady jaina lord marcus we made sure that the spirits were calmed down so they stopped setting things on fire we found evidence of alchemists fire sinani and dvolta found a journal + bags with protective runes small journal - lot of recipes for local bread w notes abt things that happened that day when trying the recipe cleric of the maiden, she was acting very sus seen around town doing sus things misfortune happening, all focused around the undead local wise woman told friend of a friend that the cleric had to be sacrificed so that chunmei would rise and protect the village was getting sus abt neighbors, zombies, talk abt the guards with crates and clanking glass she never actually saw any of the zombies, but after the sacrifice was conducted it only got worse and the zombies were frostbitten she barricade herself and her family one of her children was shivering a lot even tho there was fire 2 bags w protective charms (or symbols associated w protective charms) feast of hungry ghost (given to korkau) dust of corpse animation looks like theres gonna be a blizzard we hurry to graveyard

the blackfrost hag (form of annis hag) currently attacking spells, commanding undead, seemingly larger power (probs from Caius Thaine) disperse undead dvolta gets the hag onto our side she begins answering questions mentions we're traveling with someone of the blackfrost (mentions his hair is shaved instead his "beautiful long hair") sniper starts sniping her the Blackfrost sent her out here to spread the undead curse, gave her powers
she mentions "Jaina" and "Marcus" as guards(?) we get one question each to ask her before she dies lol

ran into a guy that says he gives his blood willingly to the Hidden Temple of the Lady of the Flames in exchange for her granting him wishes we go find the temple she's in there she had prepared a bunch of offerings for when she thought she'd have to beg us not to kill her we. aren't going to do that, we're just here to talk she's mostly benevolent, taking too much blood though, but doesn't seem to be on purpose told her to tone it down, made a pact with her for her to take less blood and to help them, in exchange for being left alone d'volta vs. korkau pickpocketing contest: GO didnt matter wasnt the point we got stuff! dvolta and korkau decided to go kill the noble lord! THE HAG WAS HIS WIFE!!!! the first wife!!!!! lets go!
Jun MeiLi (the Head Honcho Hag) was her grandmother MeiLi's gone into hiding, can't really chase after her d'volta promises to come back and solve the issue, that's that on that!

I QUIT." he leaves but not before the clothes off his back being literally taken from him and his shoes
Chun HuYing leads the gang to secret room that An Chunjun shes in charge now! yay! she was worried that the attack may have been the hags, but we told her we dealt w that adelaides magnolia oath keeper insignia goes away she gives us promise reward, tells us that if we need help from her or the province we got it we go on a walk w her for the first time! ever! shes never been out of the palace! she made friends with the people, looked around the city, she made a speech hags have been around for 600 years korkau and adelaide help ppl get closer from past loved ones free bread the people like us. a lot! we make friends :) unlike play by post we rest now 28th VANI IS TAKING REALLY LONG BATHS??????? was in bath for like. an hour shadow plane chilling
harassment from batman (Rhazien/Nightwing) my lord and master has commanded me to cease ur journey >:) ominous guy his master is a powerful wizard. wont tell us his name tho! weakest of the family vanyver is the weakest of the darvakka, they r very evil and old, they r the embodiment of entropy and wish to kill everything they hate sunlight + positive energy, harder to kill in shadow plane, tend to find a master that they stick with a bit to get more powerful, can suck magic out of weapons dvolta """""prays""""". the sun shows up. fight time

prev chosen of Aos Baia was a teacher and one day during the class there was an attack by a massive fiendish creature. they fought against the creature to buy time for the students to escape. after fighting the fiend, they were shot by an archer on the wall of the school that they saw right before they got shot (probably Lucius Valerius lol) vani apparently has changed emotions abt the party but maybe its just friendship :)

came into town rather injured, they discovered the water purification devices that people had and that they were made by the lord Pelagus Fors to purify the water the villagers tried to help them, and then shortly after the wizard lord gathered everyone up for an interrogation about why they had gone to seek out help from outside sources she was yelling about it in the square her sister managed to slip her son to her and some food while the sheriffs were distracted with the commotion she goes back to her sisters tavern we pull up to the keep ehe! vani sneak mission :-) vani sneak mission :-( we beat everybody up, trap them in stone walls, and beat them up more we saved a guy who was abt to be executed <3

Apius, apprentice
he was born to the north of Fallencall manifested magical powers lord of elements taking care of his family wizard lords swap apprentices to prevent them from making connections w people

place prev managed by beast mutagen guy (definitely not Lucas Judkins)

find out that she is willing to help us out, the blackfrost spreads to those w a predisposition to following orders
she was politically married to blackfrost mauler Marcus we offer all 3 the option of faking their deaths

dvoltas stout Dide is back from the Feywild and has a silver circlet and sparkles
abt to head to Welterglow (Starhaven) and dvolta takes off his disguise???? and is now morgan vurze teleport a lil bit outside of town, busy, nobody is chilling, everyone working a very big wealth disparity visible
go to the tavern The Dropped Anchor, morgan scooped up by Eowyn Vurze "is there a single person in this party that has a father" "yes, the holy father" she takes us to the backrooms in the downstairs under the dirt
we find out that morgans older friend is locked behind many locks, dwarven blacksmith Thraine Bronzeteeth hes been seeing hooded figures tailing him when he leaves, glimpse of metal under the hood he lets morgan into his workshop we see a clock thats counting up from over 672 years ago we hear a splash we go investigate fake morgan gets jumped by a clockwork assassin he fucking hurts -vani we turn that shit off
morgan recalibrates it to steal Caius Thaine's hat
morgan teleported it to Blackspire, and while hes gone we look at his baby photos vani is now a proud owner of a morgan baby photo "a halfling baby would be the size of a potato"
he comes back and we get info from eowyn abt the Maronda Shipping Company
it has connections to The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch and Blackfrost
church diplomat is trying to kill a family (Cu'Onda Family) "thankfully for them dvolta is a live laugh love kinda girl" we go to da woods hey mr aomar wanna tells us abt the aomars "and then i told them the truth" -zack, lying time to go on another scouting mission this time for sure :)

the only person who goes in and out of the Cu'Onda Compound is the personal assistant of Areia Cu'Onda
Trenok Lothis once a month they bring a specific doctor by, hes allowed in the compound roughly 14 days until the next doctor arrival an ornate crown with a drop of blood on it
the Sanguine Queensguard (assassin organization) likely being paid to kill someone, or paid to protect someone queensguard hightormenter, on our level w someone higher level and a few lower level lady cu'onda is heavily pregnant potentialy with abolith
but she believes its a baby of angel sent by Pelagus Fors wasting disease asbestos or magical remnant? they all lost the ability to walk, happened at different times, certainly environmental they believe it a curse
like a curse from Netherrim unable to move, someone must feed them and blind their eyes, without constant medical attention areia grows stronger every month 2 months ago started growing very strong very suddenly, seen using magics that she hadnt done before 6 months ago he saw her use a cantrip, but it was strange because shes always been a woman of science asked to send medical supplies to keep someone with this wasting disease alive the angel visits her visiting her often, with a glowing light, many white wings, a kindness
angel's name is Valerio Rend in this world, the baby feels extraplanar extraplanars are not people but more energies, but by changing who they are they can change what they are
if you are a demon and follow Asmodeus, you look the same but are considered a devil something has a very vested interest in this baby surviving to term the son of the woman who all but killed her father will return to kill her, shes certain of it its fucking morgan. whoever made the baby really wants it be born the assistant was also very keen on the defenses getting taken down, but yknow for the sake of the baby :) she starts getting testy bc yivins asking too many questions, so he leaves we meet back at the dropped anchor korkau has been stealing from the party???? lets go back to that later.
morgan reveals that he knows that the blackfrost agents and the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch agents both think that the Cu'Onda Family has captured us, and that the blackfrost is planning on raiding the compound morgan vs korkau lie to me time morgan is gathering information

the blackfrost and The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch going to the Cu'Onda Compound dvolta put us in an invis sphere so we can sneak in watching whats going on
ppl that are there: blackfrost bard, church's captain of the guard, a very decorated Venian Knight, soooooo many priests they are demanding entry, they get in then some guards show up evil dick measuring contest sneak in behind them a maid that was not there last time winks and throws down a bunch of alchemical fire (secretly a devil) dvolta goes "try to save everyone!" and then dimension doors out
goes to the basement in Lucius Valerius disguise
Areia Cu'Onda doesnt recognize him, but he lies and says that hes an envoy of the angel, the house is underseige the man servant and the maid both 5th lvl dimension door in the man servant reads dvoltas mind and helps him get out with her he asks her where her parents are to "get her to them", she says theyre in the mausoleom in the basement he teleports her a mile off the coast into the ocean and petrifies her :) he casts haste and runs back AT THE SAME TIME: the shadow that korkau summoned stays (we dont know this in character) the manservant drops his diguise. he is a veiled master! the maid is the fiend/angel (that areia was seeing) they fight
the fiend realizes they cant insta win, talked abt having worked for 600 years under the foot of "that man" and Trenok Lothis ruined it, tries to run ALSO AT THE SAME TIME: the bard calls sinani Caelus and "the master's twin". turn of events, protects him??? we get innocent people out! we kill the bloodmage trying to kill an innocent person dvolta shows up! actually as dvolta!!! no disguise!!!!!!!!!!! (darby apologizes for comparing dvolta to huey emerrich)
dvolta goes to the basement to kill the couple that slaughtered his entire family :) using phatasmal killer, where they cry out for forgiveness and none is recieved we have a little heart to heart w/ dvolta where he lies to us about being fine adelaide makes him a promise that she will stand by him and that she trusts him wholeheartedly we go back outside sinani is eating a sour lemon (being spoken to by the bard) bard is Gone
THE BABY IN THE WOMAN IN THE OCEAN IS A CHOSEN OF Tempestas Filinna. VANI FEELS THE NEED TO PROTECT IT. WTF. LEVEL 12!

we set up an ambush for Anva the Frostsong she brings a slightly undead magus simp we kill her (she bleeds out) other guy gets disintegrated dvolta can kill now. give dvolta a knife.
we loot them and find a letter to Caius Thaine Dear Lord,
Things have gotten tumultuous down here in Welterglow. I ran into little Cae, he is progressing quite well. I am certain he will approach your strength soon and all can continue to plan.
There is one issue however, our potential benefactors seem to have been absorbed by a friend of the little ones. Until he is on our side, we cannot count on their ships. I wish to stress how important it is that we get those provisions to the people, unless you too wish to rule like Drocu. Please allow me to continue this mission elsewhere, we have other options. Picked up from Anva's body. It looks as if it were unfinished due to being interrupted. they want sinani to be more powerful for some plan of theirs, which is................... bad. fancy brunch :) we go to local church of the 12 to figure out shipping company issues the church has set out detachable donation baskets
we go talk to the finance guy (Milo) he says that abt 15 years ago the company started making them pay rent so dvolta says cancel the rent
but he has his own agenda bc he wants The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch to have less influence in the area
adelaide gets a sermon about Nex Umbra yivin gets a sending
captain of the guard says theres a new orphanage run by Faun Coren, who is yivins sister. Caylon is now an orphan. :) and there???? this is probbly a hostage situation!
they referred to the orphanage in Thaumdeep as the old orphanage when it should still be operational. did smth happen to it???? adelaide sends a message to her dad receives 25 syllables of screaming. from like a hundred voices

we find Ureprith Loremeloth he says he'll teach us rituals if we kill a big scary tunneling creature creature is shanrigol behemoth pull up to the cave dvolta does dvolta things + combat silent spell is useless bc it does not increase dps :) worm explode learn rituals astral projection awaken object call spirit contact friends commune create undead elemental sentinel geass heroes feast ideal mimicry ritual invegal mystic carriage asmodean wager (pelagian wager) planar binding portrait of spite simulacrum inseen custodeans ward domain owb pact level up! level 13!

she tells us that something REALLY BIG and flying escaped Vosnan's Tower d'volta whips out the Planar Palace, so people can hide in it zap tells us about ppl trapped and needing help so we head over, kill some frogs on the way realize the hadrinnex are just trying to go home (a volcano) so we convince the ppl to let them leave (we escort them out) we sleep it is now 43rd of Vena a figure in a pale yellow cloak approaches us and asks us to talk to them in an alley what could go wrong? :) they tell us the creature is weak to fire
agents saw Ghor and Drocu speaking with Vosnan about the death of the bard vosnan was going to drocu's domain, ghor said he was too lazy to take on "the twin" lone, drocu offered his domain, vosnan agreed Drocu is green, needs a haircut Ghor is a bird

Blackspire we killed a dragon it ate adelaide but its ok she got better new baby dragon egg just dropped also many scales we went back to the city and told everyone we dealt with it
then we explored the rest of Vosnan's tower we found 6k gold paintings! 3 paintings of vosnan and friends :) A young Vosnan stands smiling with a group of other young hobgoblins, they hold a staff. Fires burn in the background of the portrait. Beside the groups are a nephilim with a face of red and black patterns, a cheerful gnome, and a some sort of deer creature. The caption reads “debut of the 2nd cohort”
the back says Vosnan, Dynst, Lucas Judkins, Elkavron A much more dour Vosnan, among a group of young folk. In the center sits an skeleton, covered in gemstones and with runes carved into his bones. Two identical blonde boys, maybe early 20 at the latest smile. One has longer hair and a glint of mischief, the other stands behind the long haired boy looking quite shy. A woman in her late 20s smiles brightly, serpents fangs visible at the corner of her mouth. A tall elf with a yellow robe holds a hand up in greeting. “Lord of Runic Pride’s Apprentices”
the back says Vosnan, Caius Thaine, Caelus Thaine, Lord of Runic Pride, Anva the Frostsong, Innirro This portrait shows one of the blonde boys, grim and scarred now, standing in the center. Vosnan is there scowling now. A blue kenku sits lazily on a stool. The raven haired woman smiles with appropriate decorum and no warmth. A young red kobold stands with arms crossed and brow ridge furrowed. A pale figure with large dark circled eyes blends into the background.
“Formation of the Blackfrost”
the back says Vosnan, Ghor, Lord of the Blackfrost, Anva, Drocu also fleshwarp dungeon clear of fleshwarps research notes w/ occasional heres the answer you stupid gayboy from caius 1 set that jumps out to dvolta: from maybe a handful of years ago, vosnan conducted an experiment where he taught fleshwarps who had powerful arcane magics. worked TOO well. vosnan had to get rid of most of the experiments before they started breaking out. not every experiment is accounted for, one is missing. we leave the tower start debating where to go next
were abt to teleport to Thaumdeep] but yivin sends a message to Faun Coren shes been kidnapped!
specificaally shes been kidnapped with Caylon! who is now one of the chosen!!!!!!! both orphanages r being watched

we said goodbye to ppl in the town Blackspire
Shadow Plane time whoa teleport next to the tower be upon ye we be stealthy just a lil bit
we hear some velstac talking about "someone" (Caius Thaine) leaving, talking abt a portal scuttle up to the top floor
3 wizards Vosnan, Ghor, Drocu] are talking about us showing up and making a deal so we dont instakill them dvolta and sinani and technically yivin talk to them about their negotiations theyll give us info in exchange for pls dont kill us we agree dvolta counterspells the geas on sinani LMAO but the geas goes thru on them (drocu)
Frostford - full of undead, and there is a portal. things seem generally grim, icky, covered in frost. looks perhaps a little bit more rundown but otherwise the same.
"Caelus Thaine, caius' twin- or, was. he died when we tried to take over shit from the bonelord guy. lord of pride or whatever. caius never really got over that. they were pretty much identical twins except reversed." don't think it's a chain of reflections "caius has made a new brother and is waiting for you to get strong enough so he can do some ritual situation." why didnt he ressurect his brother? answer: "one, i think the guy doesnt want to come back. or he cant do it without a wish ritual. casting it with a wish ritual would be a huge problem and get everyone up his ass." "when his brother died he started talking to himself like he used to talk to his brother (like talking to his reflection)." "i dont think caius ever thought of caelus of a person, more of an extension of himself"
"their mom was someone they were protecting, don't know what happened to her but she wasnt a fan of the caelus stuff" (roughly that) "some strange metal elemental was summoned a few days ago in the capital and tried to attack caius. he said he had some people to talk to things with and went to his teleportation circle. havent heard from him since." nobody in the capital has seen him since then. why does he make you runelords, specifically. answer: "the runelord is the only tradition he's ever known. once the lord of runic pride died and we continued the tradition. until sinani, and talked about challenges and journeys and said that you'd need a challenge but not too hard." [insert caius aeon stones list] "really suddenly spiked in power, hasn't always been this powerful" figured it out under lord of runic pride. went away a little bit in the mountains and was like oh yeah i can make zombies out of frost that can explode. has been perfecting it since then. they dont have it but pretty much everybody else does.
he went to basically the border of Thaumdeep, Azoicmound, The Great, Holy, and Pious Alliance of Kingdoms "he can cast 10th rank arcane spells" "SOMEONE, STATISTICALLY, has got to be a witch" dvolta: me, next question. overstuff and take it's course gets from his runelord. he's gluttony.
Ernog Snowgleam's portraits are all slightly different.
"hes liable to just chill. he's got the domain to the northeast, just under Zan Nine-toes's." "if there were 5 of him, he could take caius on. he's the strongest of the apprentices."
Drocu points out big worm, says we should tame it one day. (it is the same strength as caius) big worm on the bucketlist lecture abt how the church is bad to adelaide number so many fake that there was a battle
teleport to Welterglow new month!!! it's spring!

sessions/chosen-by-gods/session-36.html.description:
Prev Session: Session 35
Next Session: Session 37 korkau! :D time for downtime stuffs
Adelaide: approached by a cleric in vanis hometown Stonehaven named Leylah Fulford, shes older, has been doing this her whole life, approaches her asking for her advice. she asks to help plan festival of spring bc of The Maiden, adelaide agrees. big banquet, adelaide pays bakery for many breads. she helps build tiny structure dedicated to the other gods, has the vibes of ppl celebrating good things and its generally a good time!
D'volta: making business grow :) with Hamiko of the Winter Wind from Arcanum and Tawdrywilde. reopening trade routes
Sinani: hes with the Grove Druids. theyre doing ok. but now ppl are coming to him for help with rituals bc hes like one of the highest level casters there! gets closer with Mytiphe Yivin: safe house design! Korkau: cleared out a soldier graveyard and raised an army of undead. to terrify the northern reigon :)
Vani: helping fix up the town. specifically help Grandpa Eudes and bc Sunshine doesnt have eyes!
Adelaide: been casting sending and getting more screams back in return. but also something else! theres a pattern! it spells out Valane. D'volta: dvolta messages 100 men!
Sinani: druids finding a ton of refugees from Barrenbreak] and the edges of Fallencall. sinani is helping out with them and has dvoltas help with temporary housing with then & growing the population. Yivin: foreman's son is sick! its medicine resistant form of the common cold, yivin helps, the kid gets better. Korkau: made friends with Vlad the Vampire and got them to evacuate and go on vacation but on vacation is going to take the place of some noble family that korkau doesnt like. vampys shouldnt be killing people but can feed on criminals & soldiers.
Vani: some Lunahelm Raiders decide they can move in on territory of guts berserk (vani). they are captained by a guy who is lvl 3. vani knocks them all out. drags them into the woods and tells them very sternly to not do it again.
Adelaide: adelaides traveling back home! which is in Netherrim. she is going based off of landmarks which are drastically changed to her. getting closer and closer to the farm, her core starts to glow. she reaches a point where she gets closer to the ground it grows brighter, so she starts digging and finds a lock box. its got the symbols that are on her core, and is also glowing. she holds it close to her core and unlocks, revealing a sheet of metal with writing in utopian, a packet of seeds that are native flowers to netherrim and symbolize happiness and are called adelaides. :) theres a knit hat that is perfectly adelaides size. D'volta: dvolta messages :)
Sinani: there are ppl from Zan Nine-toes's section of Fallencall (zan is off on the boat) that are wanting to leave, wanting to cross the border to Ravenyard. sinanis able to help them cross, big battles, protection. he checks in with other ppl in fallencall, and is able to bring them to ravenyard with the permission of An Chunjun. Yivin: more ppl came to them for healing, accidentally made a hospital! druids came to help purify the well water because it was making ppl sick! Korkau: we cast a ritual that made all of the soldiers not know who their friends and allies are! cool! :) put a pin in cursing the pope's bloodline. Vani: ppl started hearing abt the village, more refugees started showing up! so vani took some party funds to help make a little came for them, use his skills to help the ones he can with healing. village happily took them in bc vani said pwease
Adelaide: she gets a scroll of pinpoint and gives it to dvolta to learn and cast and um. they cast it Erasmus's soul, its flickering in and out like a radio frequency which is not how the spell works! it is in the dead center of Valane abt 100ft off the ground. D'volta: decided to take a break to teleport to the edge of the world, oh shit theres an edge of the world. teleports around if you hit it. theres a center to the world, there isnt supposed to be! world is 4000miles in radius in hemisphere, maybe sphere, yet to confirm downward direction. giant guardian beasts that dont like ppl messing with it. extremely high level magic, check it out later? center is in the tristate area!
Sinani: sinani meets w person he got the handmedowns from! name is Lillyanna and is the mirror of Elowan . She a ghorran, has a plant creature for an eidolon. theyve been fighting devils in the plane of earth, but the devils have become very busy with something else. elowan was lonely and talked to the mirror, and thats how lillyanna came about by being dragged out there. new friend and ally for planar stuffs! :D Yivin: safehouse is safe! druid that came down decided to stay and help with the hospital!
Korkau: finally parted ways, and established bffs forever. korkau can call him up if ever need to. buddy is Ai Jinghou Vani: village is turning more into a city now! so many ppl here! they decide it needs a name, so they named it Stonehaven in honor of vani :D (cries). he learned how to bake bread! LEVEL 15

dropped off with Variol Arden in the form of a woman she carries it up the mountain, dangerous, goes thru tunnels and caves looks annoyed abt it the whole time tbh arrives at a small flat plateau at the top of the mountain, as if the top of the mountain was cut off inscribed with long faded runes and symbols, mossy and craggy agreed to cast illusory scene so we can see it happening varial waits and the rocks begin to move, and they shake off the moss and dirt since the last time they stood up a giant lizard with big wings & gold scales, a dragon, awakens "ahh, little devil what brings you here?" "theres a group that thinks they can break the seal, im here to show them that they cannot" "ahh, good, yes, show the runes" he sits up to show the entrance of a cave varial enters, it is covered in ancient paintings, color mostly faded but still visual 8 beings fighting off a great creature, beings on 1 side, spells and weapons, great heroes creature on opposite side, massive darkness with many arms, swarms of smaller creatures crawl from the sea & shambling creatures covered in blue crystals the heroes seal the creature away because they couldnt defeat it, and the symbols of our gods are shown on the beings the translucent forms of the figures are on their bodies the heroes are generally becloaked its hard to make out, youd have to go there to restore the painting one who has a light pink cloak, with the symbol of a half sun on the back A S I some of the inscriptions have letters under them, the figures are labeled arent super clear dragon must be more than a thousand years old "What's depicted in the cave you're guarding?" This is the Great Sacrifice that saved many worlds. An important and cautionary tale. Throughout history it's common enough that the Chosen It seems like the last 600 years the Chosen have been kept super weak and not kept together
As soon as the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch gets everyone together, the marks jump around It was very common for a group to be chosen and they would rise to great power, but not do anything with that power, or be corrupted, or be hunted down by their friend, the raiders interfere a lot Sometimes a group would get lost in the mountains "How old are you? (dragon)" I'm from the... dawn of time (unsure inflection?) The timeline goes past 1k, but gets funky the earlier in age so ppl think there just wasnt a lot of stuff You can find ruins from before 1k years, but they're very very destroyed There's scriptures of the gods from before who would intervene "The Lady of Art"
Hurgen Valificus - The Great Nephew of the Right Hand Rithous Valificus the 3rd Just a normal super high level cleric (9 or 10, maybe) Becloaked advanced automatons working on the wall
The city is run by Lord Netherrim
Valane impeccably clean, many automatons and robots without souls Sometimes people go by, hurrying by Human and Elven-ish Seem to be a couple large families

it's trying to go back in time to kill Lucius Valerius and prevent it's own creation which would fuck up a lot of things! it believes its creation was a great injustice. its right, but Adelaide and it talked trying to convince it to change it's ways, it responds with. this is why im here this is my purpose adelaides like. well my purpose was farming and i sucked but i found a new one! and its like. well that sucks for you. this is MY purpose more of that party is starting to talk like. ok should we kill it right we fight it adelaide kills it shatters into a bunch of pieces they start to fizzle and fade away one sticks around and leaves a scratch on adelaides chest over where her heart would be we do call the spirit! adelaide asks her dad some questions adelaide asks whatever happened when she was put to sleep erasmus was sent to war and didnt want to create beings with souls to fight (they wanted to send adelaide) and he didnt want to do that so he made a bunch of soulless automatons the elders called him to fight (everyone got called to fight) it didnt go well, obvs

no more Tempestas Filinna mark, only a shadow that looks like a birthmark on his cheek "hell yeah stab dad" "i learned that from the sailors at the dock" "stab dad???" "no! hell!" Yivin all the children are happy they have a bed and that its personalized "i want to stay for a while until everything is settled, make sure everything is calm and theyre supported" yivin is gonna go explore around the continent oh god faun doesnt know abt the bubble Dvolta
goes home Welterglow creating an illusory scene, explaining the events of the last 30 years, duration is a day, keeps repeating digging up his family keeping them separated in case they get resurrected earlier no complications dvoltas father comes up and puts a hand on his shoulder and starts crying "my son, you're a man!" "guess i'm the oldest now" "we were much more worried about you than the business, i'm so glad you're okay." "i've always been the lucky one." passes along the business but keeps a few ships "there's another bit coming after i become a wizard lord, but let's enjoy a month together." adelaide
a few weeks later, adelaide makes the trip to medium sized parish area where she learned about being in the The Holy Order of the Lawful Patriarch
Siobhan and Carolyn come to greet adelaide
"the right hand, he passed away, and his grandnephew was supposed to succeed him but the grandnephew is nowhere to be found. there's all sorts of reports of the gods breaking their silence. a friend of mine saw a cloaked figure made of stars looking around, observing. Nex Umbra was there! had a star in one hand, and the sky in the other. nex umbra has been seen! others are claiming miracles by others we've never heard of!" adelaide tells them about the "gods" and her dad Sinani
many miles to the north east in Fallencall meets with dvolta to discuss making a school in the area, heal up the earth from Evil Energies
oh god he offers talking with Caelus Thaine! we will get back to those 10 questions Dvolta
scrying and scouring the seabed to get Areia Cu'Onda sinani unstones her the angel was working for the squid monsters she takes her baby and 3000 gold and leaves adelaide after months, she puts the finishing touches on the farmhouse (with indoor plumbing invented and added!)
youre not going back out and journeying the lands? Erasmus my main goal was to come home :pleading: she and her dad go on a road trip :) Sinani
Vinry and Oaky get given the collar of eternal bond and stampede medallion Vani city is doing well!
goes home Stonehaven
Sunshine HAS BABIES.... 5 TINY LITTLE PUPPIES Yivin Someone runs up and says theres an accident at the dockyard a group of young healers are scurrying around his apprentice We each go to sleep and find ourselves in a council room with each other and also d'volta and d'volta is VERY THERE Word of Recall We all teleport to where D'volta is Mansion in Welterglow where he's almost done with a teleportation spell Window full of stars behind him We arrive at a place where the sun is beginning to rise, but it was nowhere near rising in Welterglow There's a ship docked down the coast a few ways on a sandy beach There's an island with a bluegreen jungle Tall spires of stone reaching up above the canopy that has a flat tip Mountains that are flattened on top instead of pointed Jungle doesnt reach all the way to the top Magnificent Mansion We're on the old/new world No one else made it to the other side yet The sand is pink In the magnificent mansion theres a crack from the baby dragon egg Leafy creature body Wiggles in the sand seems happy in the sand the jungle is the same color of the dragon's leaves NOT avasoryd dvolta lets us know that we're basically the first ppl simultaneously landing in the new world! hes made potions so we can live longer? whoa he couldve invited us to dinner but this is his equivalent so its ok he does a magnificent mansion OH GOD THE EGG IS CRACKING itty bitty baby leafy dragon waddles out into sand like sea turtle its where it is happy!! the jungle is the same color as its leaves it imprints on yivin we set up another recall so we can meet every year :') THE END.

The Heretic does not awaken, but the party meets Hag Mom
Party ends up killing False God, his guardian Knight Guardian is shocked and upset after the mind control is gone

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-1.htm.title: Session 1
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-1.htm.description:
Kavi Samudra
Zhu Ruohan
Matsuoka Shizuka
You Guiying
Katsuarashi Myna Prev Session:
Next Session: Session 2
Willowshore First of summer Waking up, remember previous night, recall being dragged by the townsfolk Look around, things seem strange Straw mats and red blindfolds seem a lot more dirtier than yesterday Also, when we went to sleep to wait for the “rescue”, we’re pretty sure it was a different part of the woods Almost like we were dragged to a different part of the woods in the middle of the night Dragged from the northish, lot of marks around the clearing, things are surprisingly stirred up Its technically not mandatory for them to deliver the food, sometimes the deliverer gets hungover and doesnt show up and thats “escaping from kidnappers” instead of being ransomed
Choe Chung-hu’s absence is particularly strange, he follows his word It seems as though some kind of fight occurred here between a number of people who seem to have been chased off by something that looks like a person walking on stilts? It left circular poles as it chased them away This seemed to be some sort of giant. 8 legged creature Slightly before we arrive at the bridge, hear some strange rustling swiftly approaching form the bushes Centipedes :( That can speak??? Experiencing rage Centipedes are getting more and more articulate as the fight goes on Super unusual for centipedes to be in the daytime and should also be running away after we killed the 1st centipede in combat Seems like the influence of some kind of evil spirit, they have unusual intellect, are aggressive and malicious 10 mins since we woke up, instead of nice summer weather we were expecting, a very strong fog rolls in By the time the river is in sight, its affecting ability to see Notice strange shapes moving and shifting around our vision, but when we look, theres nothing there Shizuka and kavi remember a nursery rhyme

Spider Gate! Smth looks off tho. The spider’s missing The lantern lies extinguished in the grass below The spider is the one that saved us in the forest Light the lantern, we take it, the lantern calms us. Dense fog but not HORRIFYING dense fog Kavi convinced someone carted the spider away, it headed east and then went into the river. Didnt go to the bridge, went to the river Eastern watchtower 1/5th mile later, smells like blood, 2 towns guardsmen are dead, other 2 are bluegrey humanoids that were slain by swordblows Guards died to snakebites to the legs, the humanoids are gremlins Seems to have happened night/early morning Up in the guard tower, a woman peers down at us Alive or dead? “Alive. Are you alive or dead?” Alive “Recite 4 of the practices of the season of ghosts to prove you arent more monsters in disguise” “You might wanna check on your families, ive been hearing- be cautious going back. Ive been hearing screams and roars, other unsettling sounds have been echoing all night. Since well after midnight, before the fog even showed up .since dawn, things have been completely silent.” She gives us feather token, a crossbow, and then more lantern oil As we approach, blood begins to seep up from the earth, turning the area into sucking gorey mud Despite the blood-soaked mud clinging, we can step off before it sucks us down Blood of those who died in the area is bubbling up from the earth When within 100ft of the bridge, theres fresh blood For the first time, the stone lantern is extinguished A Large man is sitting on a makeshift throne, people are putting on a show of the deaths of people who recently died Making merry so loudly, we dont need to actively sneak past because of how heavy the mist is and how loud they are There have been some boats beaten in and purposefully destroyed
Cloud Paper House is empty No signs of a struggle, seems like they left in a hurry
Hastily written note that says Matsuki on it
There seems to be some lights on at the Matsuki Estate, hard to notice bc it seems theyve been dimmed Some protective lanterns lit
At Eternal Blaze Ironworks, its swiftly abandoned Odd that sister would leave workshop messy Made sure it wasnt gonna burn down At graveside manners, note “There has been an attack, go to any walled buildings.”
Go to Matsuki Estate Recite ghost rules Miller lets us in Entering the estate, there are a lot of people in here, including
You So-Jin, makeshift med station
Yong Wu-Xiu
Kawaka Myna
Yong Wu-Xiu checks in on zhu, so frightened We were gone for a day but what a day “Yeah normally waking up an hour or 2 late is no big deal. We didnt expect to be woken up in the middle of the night” Katsu’s dad runs over Sooo frightened “Creatures descended on the town, started slaughtering! Killing people in the middle of the night. If not the quick thinking of old matsuki to spread the word about the estate being safe… IDK what couldve happened!” We gotta thank him! “Oh hes over there. Oh hes looking. He knows- hes received lots of reports. Im glad youre safe!”
You so-jin sortve tends to person that is wounded, she is clearly emotional but not willing to leave bedside It seems as though the person has been hit with a spear, kind a big spear, in the shoulder, trying to save the arm with alchemical knowledge Zhu heals people up Guy whos arm was just saved “The creature is also drunk!” Then itll be a fair match More or less tho? “More!” “I saw it let someone go before it hit me with a spear because they gave him their serving of festival wine from last night.” Old matsuki “Im glad you all made it back ,you performed great, im so sorry tragedy befell” Is it ur fault “I hope not? What happened to you all” Explain
“Several refugees saw a horse sized spider walking thru the mist. I plan on recruiting Silvermist Lodgesppl but theyre busy saving people in the streets. I didnt want to send them out in case ugly cute wasnt out. If you run into a hunter, itd be good to send them back here to discuss” Granny hu is across the bridge Its a buso Creatures that go out to fight, but don’t fight with the buso. “Its also drunk. More drunk than you are. Im the only one whos seen every stage of willowshore youngin!” We know all shrines in the village
Downtown Willowshore is infected with monsters
Some people are sheltering in the inn, including Mother Otis and Elizeth Candora
Our blessings: Minister Almantas, Nekane Modis, Nayeli

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-2.htm.title: Session 2
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-2.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 1
Next Session: Session 3
Willowshore
We’re going to the Dawnstep Bridge The guy and co are doing their play where theyre making fun of the villagers they axe murdered We get stopped bc our stealth was bad \We wanna add to ur alcohol collection but the finest are across the bridge “Where across the bridge?” Too complicated “I suppose celebrating the deaths of all of these is a fine occasion.” “Ok you can go across but next time bring us the good wine” Ofc would you like to help us w the riddles “No im busy” We’ll come back if we have any issues Cross the bridge
Ceiba-Duyue Exchange (talking to Granny Hu and co.) “Howd you get across??” Bad wine We need poison “Oh thatd be at the clinic no?”
“I would think the doctor would have some over at The Hand of Spring. I invited him to come join us but he did refuse to abandon his clinic” “Hes the only doctor in town” “Youre sure you are up to the task of poisoning the creatures?” Are you going to do it? “Well. alright. nothing youve said inspires courage” We told her how we dealt with monsters outside the town.
“I have marked on this board every place where monsters are or where people are trapped. If youve come here after dealing with more than 1, this is good for you to know. Also hes not in charge, the brain is someone named Mo Duoquo. I think he might be a human w occult powers or human-like yokai. I think its more important to take down the creatures downtown since this one is sending orders to the rest. Then the Eternal Lantern of course. That seems like smth of import. The most important thing downtown is that my son in law Zheng Peng is holding the Imperial Barracks and he’ll be able to hold out for a week. The next plan of action is to retake the barracks and the armory. Also i am worried of my grandchildren. They went towards the Mushroom House and i havent seen them since. I suspect that they have hosted a private party there and were unable to return home.”
Mother’s Coil After entering the door slams behind us even though theres no breeze Locking door haunt
Igawa Jubei has left, shes not here, left no note Do see signs of a contraption left outside her door that seems to have been sprung Loop of thick rope that just. Was on the ground. Rope tie. Yoink, like snare trap Broke the tree it was attached to, unlikely it had enough pull to raise a full humanoid adult woman into the air but would have injured To the doctor!! <3 (Hand of Spring) Western half of clinic Boarded up Doors shut Eastern half Hissing noises??? Scary… its more fucking centipedes. Theyre fighting a phantom gecko We plan to shoot the centipedes thru the windows/slats Centipedes dont want convo, just threats Some wildlife while attacking us just choose to do whisper threatening things Smth supernatural is def afoot, odd that theyre actively evil and more intelligent. Seems like the influence of a spirit strong enough to influence the whole area Statue of a gecko above, it seems not that smart and erring on the side of ppl who enter=intruder, it seems unlikely to attack us if we dont attack it After a full round of no violence, it dispels After hearing the fighting stop, the doctor rushes back in “Thank you, youve come to rescue us! You even saved the guardian spirit.” We get poison (dreamtime tea) Dami won’t leave bc the ppl are injured, so Zhu heals the entire room Igawa Jubei is here The little blue creatures set a snare for her at the wizard tower, but she's a grown person and it didn't work, she then came to the clinic
Wizard + Huo Tian-Zhe holing up in the clinic to protect anyone who shows up Back to to the bridge Give the poisoned alcohol to Gurglegut He falls asleep The little creatures run away in fear thinking we slayed him Gurglegut has cantrip deck, silver scepter, and original lantern coins Reignite the lantern, the strange fog that has been plaguing the town begins to lift We get a blessing from the lantern We level up
Mercantile Street
Downtown Willowshore

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-3.htm.title: Session 3
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-3.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 2
Next Session: Session 4
Mercantile Street
Yun Mong-un is not here The doors to home have been torn off the hinges, drag marks on the ground
Following leads past to Luo and Laws
Leads us to Downtown Willowshore As we head through, hear the loud clatter of silverware Not super near, doesnt seem to be actively seeking us out There is some sort of loud jingling procession occurring at least a street or 2 over Shizuka notices that the noises in the open air stage, cant see beyond the stage, but can hear several voices loudly performing Cant make out the words, theyre not enunciating, we don’t recognize them
Upon the stage, we can see Kazuma Oono has been tied up to a chair and hasnt been physically injured, but at least emotionally upset as 6 gremlins tear apart his script as they perform it Theyre super drunk and also wearing jewelery
Guiying recognizes the jewelery of Nadoya Sanmi wore on her wedding day Family heirloom, very nice, whats left after giving some to her children So part dowry, part treasure from her parents They’re wearing it as props for the play and Kazuma is pissed but scared of them Zhu: i see youve found new crew! “In a manner of speaking!” Zhu: sorry im talking to the new crew not you gremlins: hes very bad at this Zhu: would you do the honors of releasing him? Save him “The creatures stormed into my abode, they dragged me out into the street. They ransacked my home, i just finished my latest work in progress! It was very nice.”
Pick up the jewelery. Necklace belongs to one of shizukas parents (Shizuka's Mom, Shizuka's Dad) It is cursed Something about it was easily twisted Have you seen anyone else downtown?
“Zheng Peng, but he didnt come save me. I was tied to this chair, and in conjunction with the jewelery and the Sanmi Family, i believe there was a disturbance at their home. Also the bathhouse.” We should get you somewhere safe first “Where is safe?”
We have the Ceiba-Duyue Exchange and the Matsuki Estate
“Ill go to the exchange. I assume Hu Ban-niang and Luda Bama are there?” We leave him for him to go somewhere safe and continue on our way We hear the sound of cookware still Zheng Peng is leaning against the wall in the daytime He is super supposed to be tied up in jail, greets us happily which is weird Zhu sees his eyes and nose slide off his face, tells us he’s not the real one He tries to get us to investigate the barracks We say we dont remember our names, do you remember “No time, we must retake the barracks!” Zhu wacks him over the head with a mace He is actually a noppera-bo

We dress zhu up in his armor, send him into the Imperial Barracks Cackling as a trap is set off Zhu: i thought i told you to not set it off “Apologies! Please dont take us to the tea house!”
The teahouse?
“Yes! The teahouse! With um. The lord. Lord Mo Duoquo!” You think youre so good to go to the teahouse! “We dont want him to kill us!” The teahouse would be a luxury to what youve earned! Some associates of mine are to walk in, what of other traps? “Want us to take them down?” Yes, and throw one of yourselves on it. Least favorite Which guy did you let out?? “Dont worry abt it my liege!” “They were gonna send a villager to the teahouse but he escaped and ran away” Zhu messages the real guard, telling him to play along, hes a bad performer “They call him the great butcher! Thats what they call him! I dont like him!” We unlock the jail cell, take the armory key, and pretend to lock it back We jump the creatures and the guards free the other prisoners
Governor's Manor appears to be gone?? Lion statues are still there, but everything else is just missing, flat ground
Governor Heh Shan-Bao has been here for like 3-4 years and his beliefs align more north (will come back to this with more details!) Teahouse Unlock the door Corpses in the teahouse
One is granny hu’s daughter Granny Hu's Daughter
12 people in the room, one is Yun Mong-Un (Shizuka’s aunt/guardian) They all seem to be who they say they are We free them We enter the building and try to sneak past a frog?? We fail at that Shizuka tries to tame the big ass frog, it decides to leave us alone “Ah hello! You must be the new entertainment” Define it? “A song? A dance? Lighten it up?” Would you like to join the people in the rafters “Ehhhh” “I havent tried autoerotica asphixiation. You want me to try it on you?” He offers us some rice wine, extending his long neck 20ft to us Mr fluffy whiskers the attack ferret Dead body in the room is the miller who was supposed to pick us up after the festival in the morning He and zhu decide to be upside down Fight, kill him We get mr fluffy whiskers on our side Get financial paperwork
Says that theres a mildly difficult thing for Qing Mai-Lai’s inheritance. First person or group that gets pearls from Jiyong’s eyes
Location north (The Fox’s Eyes) that Lord Jiyong was buried in, perhaps it is related to that Level 3

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-4.htm.title: Session 4
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-4.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 3
Next Session: Session 5
Willowshore, Downtown Willowshore Investigating the silverware sounds Town guards are fighting off the silverware situation as we approach They will win eventually but. Swarms are nasty
Sentient apron trying to strangle Zheng Peng to death
Nadoya Sanmi also here, clutching her eyes, lots of blood, clutching her head Her eyes have been irreparably damaged from being in a silverware swarm “Thank you all for saving my life again” Yes ofc
“I saw some fishermen down by the Ceiba River” Wasnt the river not safe? “I’m not sure, I was in jail”
“I heard some disturbance in the Happy Kappa” Gremlins are fleeing, you wouldn’t happen to know whats up with that right Yeah we killed their leader Oh hell yeah We go to investigate the river
Floating boards, familiar nagaji man pulling a soaking wet rat (Zataku) out of a lake (Rajul Samudra) Father what’s going on? “Ah hello daughter! You’re intact? Fairing well? Yes, no help from you. Whats going on here? “Zataku and i were here when the mists descended, we thought we’d take some important items and get out of here, but suddenly we were surrounded and grasping hands tore up our boat until the current pushed us up to the shore.” Anyone injured? “Mostly cuts and scrapes but Im more worried abt the other fishers who went out “Once the mist lifted i saw some crashed boats but I’ve sort of been trying to keep my friend here (the rat) from drowning” okay,,..., “Things seem a lot safer we can go look?” Yeha we’ve been working on it “Oh nice good uh… good job. Very proud of you my daughter.” I really appreciate it Father. Wow this is intensely awkward “Anyways we are going to look for more boats now” If you run into anything you are certian you cannot handle PLEASE come find us. We will deal with it Dont worry I dont need to send my child to stand in front of me.
I can handle myself father PLEASE. Just let us know if you need help. We have dealt with so much around town we cleared out the Dawnstep Bridge and Downtown Willowshore Were there gremlins there Yeah a good amount and a silverware parade. Several sentient bugs and a large frog Sounds pretty tough yeah!!!!! Also a rokurokubi, we dealt with that. Its been a long day. You do know I am a part of this, it’s not just them doing it? Oh well. Neat! Anyways im going to go make sure nobody else crashed their boat in that fog. Do you have a weapon in case? I mean it was just some fog and a couple… You never know. (gives him a dagger) “Thanks”
Granny Hu, Ceiba-Duyue Exchange Same ppl there as last time, a few more stragglers “Ah how does it go?’
Hello granny, we came to let you now, your son in law Zheng Peng, we have found and rescued him. But also bringing bad news, we have found your daughter (Granny Hu's Daughter) in the Cerulean Teahouse. I’m very sorry for your loss granny Her general stoicism, calm granny vibes less for a minute as she pardons herself “Excuse me, I-I need a moment”
Kim Gu-won takes reports on our behalf of the town being liberated and switched to pieces to show whats been solved We mention we killed the creature that killed her daughter We fully debrief her Asking Kim Gu-won if anything else has been occurring in this area “We’ve been dealing with rescuing farmers from their homes and checking the houses down the river. Nothing we couldn't handle so far. I’d expect with the leader defeated and the mist clearing, things will be very fortuitous Have you all made any contact with south willow shore? “No, focused on this area Some things get cleared out, end of the day, long rest
Guiying checking in with the leshies at Leshy's Saloon and helping out with cleanup around town Help with debris to get to houses that are closed off. Leshies are good, mountain summit grass gets my help Kavi Dealing with haunts, helping those in the river
Focus on downtown 1st, notice a lot of general concern about the missing Governor's Manor, but beyond Kavi’s understanding. Successfully clear downtown of traps and haunts Zhu helping medically, haunt sight Shizuka scouting the edge of the woods, trying to find people Find a hunter who has been gravely injured by a trap in the woods, are able to bring her back to town She lets her know abt where the others are, they can be gotten
Katsu helping at Old Man Matsuki
Kawaka Myna, his shop (Cloud Paper House) will be replacing paper sliding doors that were destroyed so very busy Also trying to find someone to create portraits of those who died without one so they can be displayed at funeral
He’s working on repairs of Matsuki Estate, hands list of the dead to katsu Shizuka sleeps in a haunted-ish area of town She’s okay but in the night, she hears some kind of disturbance Strange clattering noise in the night, coming from some locked doors further in the estate Gives a fright in the middle of the night
Stone rubbing against each other as a creature drags itself further into the Abandoned Estates Exchange, granny hu is doing a little better but still having a rough time
“Normally i’d send my son in law, but he is not in his right mindset considering what happened. Someone needs to go to Karahai, tell them about the disaster, and get a priest of Lady Jansoo to give the dead their rights.” Two paths to Karahai, the Treacherous Trail and a slightly safer path using the river Dangerous journey to Karahai, a day’s journey out Approaching nightfall, threatening to rain all day but hasnt yet
As we are a little past Gourd Lake We notice that we go from being able to see the town off in the distance to, as we approach, we see a large barrier A giant wall of mist Zhu walks through it, finds himself walking back out in the direction of his friends despite walking in a straight line No matter how many times we try to move forward, the fog grows.
