Kawsay Market Mostly elementals purchasing from here Stall with cloth (cotton) clothing Stall with wooden jewelery 100-1000s of gp worth Seller’s daughter has the druidic talent, uses the proceeds to support entire village Daughter puts some sort of clear solution to make it that they don’t as quickly wither away did they figure out uv resin. (they definitely didnt) There is a woman here that people keep trying to get the attention of to sell her something
Gold jewelery, one with a stone that matches her eyes Here on her own Not worried about wearing such oscentatious jewelery Acquired her dress on a trip to Alhadarat Alsahabia Invites us to dine with her “Just a humble lady of no real importance” ITS THE MAYOR’S WIFE Offers to introduce us to Takuachi(sp) Dol’ore lies to her and gives a few pieces of copper and says that it’s worth a lot She gives us 500gp in return bc we don’t “carry any local currency” Eyeing HuLang’s instrument
Lady Kuyaq
Thari Tajir
Big ass wings
Ambassador for House Tajir and Alhadarat Alsahabia Thinks we might be able to assist each other If we’re open to it Thari Tajir Smokesoul sylph - Strix Someone influenced by the element of smoke Go back with Lady Kuyaq A little out of breath from the stairs Asks HuLang about his instrument
Chakuq Mansion Mayor
Fully elemental, but he’s medium not large
Govenor Yawaray Chakuq He widens his eyes slightly when he’s not telling the truth - Was appointed by Lady Munaspa a long time ago - After the end of the war, right after they got this location as a city - He survived the war by “luck” and “bravery” - Lie - Open to people crossing borders
- Knows a cleric in Abadi Khota that he can get in contact with
- Can find out if our allies are in Sthira or Alhadarat Alsahabia
- Asks for his wife and Tachiyak leave
- There’s an urgent task that we are more suited to do than talking to D'Volta Aomar - Has heard word that Lady Munaspa has plans on replacing him with her child - The boy spends a lot of time in the city (nominally in charge of the southern most island) - Asks us to find out anything to convince him to not accept that offer - Would be able to give us passage off the island + monetary compensation - The wife takes HuLang to play some instruments - He does like fine - She takes a bit of her hair, granting him a token of appreciation - “I’m not sure what he all offered you for finding your people, but I also have ways of getting you that information and getting transportation to Abadi Khota. But I would need a key to the inner sanctum to the Yura Muyushka.” Tachiyak
- The steward who took us to Azar - Closer to an elemental than a scion - We are welcome to come here anytime Theres a room with grass and and an unreadable plaque It’s very quiet within the room Talk to the grass inside the room Sometimes they hear the door rattle Sometimes they say 1 word, 1 word often, we hear it, we remember it
Kuraq Munaspa Their roots extend to the box - Room with scrolls - Mostly primal and some occult that they accidentally mixed in - Magic room - Very occult - Sphere doesn’t look like its supposed to be from here - The plants are gathered (like cutting) - Book - Constructing creatures from plants and also various strange occult rituals and spells - Summoning and banishing - A lot of banishing to different planes
Yay Munaspa Mansion Thari Tajir is in our home He has a key bc they don’t change the locks Good to know!!!! Overheard that we’re trying to get people out of Abadi Khota Says that Lady Munaspa us probably not gonna do anything abt it Knows this bc he’s known her for a while Mutually beneficial If we were to get him one of those trees that make money he’d get us to Alhadarat Alsahabia Once there it gives us access to any elemental Alhadarat Alsahabia lets anyone who can fly in there automatic citizenship People can’t fly are still allowed in, not automatic citizenship tho Knowledge of a couple money trees disconnected that aren’t connected to the God Tree Chakuq Mansion has some that are not connected, surrounded by a stone box Grafting is something that is Not Common Knowledge He’s trying to impress his father, so having access to one of these plants is very beneficial for Alhadarat Alsahabia Father: Head of House Tajir, more element-y than bird

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 10
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:

Kawsay
Go to get our sending scrolls from Great Library
Chuya Hatun
Has our sending scrolls
Fechin is canonically out for the day (gave us a note with a crow drawing) (Scath stole them) Someone’s taken a tome on shadow magic from the private collection of the library Man i wonder who (hehe) Also more bugs Messages
Sending to captain Enu Stormgrip
"This is Hu Lang, where are you currently? We are by giant tree. Looking for crew. Made peaceful contact with locals. You can respond."
“Under sea. Recently removed from prison. Now guests. Crew scattered. Some with Venian Knights northwest. Korina Demaki southeast. With me or taken by bird.” Sending to Harbormaster back home
"The Windseeker attacked by unknown, crews scattered, peaceful contact with locals established. We have contacted captain. Update from your end and supplies appreciated." “Will inform chain of command. Calling priority incident. And asembling senders. Will be in contact with all team leaders. Stay safe.”
‘Assembling senders’ being Azar Go to library again
Asking about sons of Lady Micha Munaspa “The currently ruling ones? Or the deceased one as well?”
Kuraq Munaspa = Deceased, used to rule wastelands
Yunkakuna Munaspa, deep forest
Allpa Munaspa northwest, grassland
Mitiuq Munaspa swamp southwest
Qata Munaspa mountain northeast
Ch’usaq Munaspa rules over barren lands southwest (he is as empty as his land)
Paqarichiy Munaspa is south, youngest, contested wastelands Asking about Paqarichiy’s house location
Mention he’ll be up in the cloud palace (Puyu Palace)
Goes to the Pillpintu Bar sometimes We get lady munaspa’s pin Go to the Cloud Palace Paqarichiy Munaspa
- Weirdly proud of pulling the table out of the ground! - Probably has around 3rd level spells - Would typically expect him to have it inherently as a djinn - The spell he used is on the primal list tho - Either a wizard or a primal caster - He accepts our hanging out here - He has stuff he wants to do that he doesn’t want to do in front of us - “I thought genies innately had magic?” - HE MAKES A FACE. - He’s sweating under his coat a lot - Do’lore bullshits about being able to see through his clothes - He acts really awkward and tries to save his modesty some - Acts like she’s seen something - Focuses really hard like casting a spell - “Why haven’t your arms changed as well?” - ‘They’re the same, it is by choice, I can change it at dawn.’ - Has a tattoo! Favorite color is blue so it is blue. - Doesn’t want us to tell anyone about his teenage rebellion. - Asks about Mav’s tattoos
- Shocked about Lir - Concerned and asking about Mav and Sunny still being friends despite elemental differences - Lying so hard about his tattoo, pretty sure he could just change the color of the wood on his face. Almost said familiar. - Snake! Light blue! - Made a deal - Similar to Mav
- Offer Sinani to come over - “Hopefully I’ll still be alive in 5 years!” - The southern quadrant is in violent conflict - They were gonna burn him alive - A thing said it’d save him, a flurry of snow put the fire out - Icicle snake - Can spells now, mother is so proud - Can cast like a druid, but also can summon snow and sleet. Not very wood of him! - He’s in charge of down here bc the south killed his brother - Staying in the city for a hundred years, mother will appoint someone to take care of it until I step back in - He gives us tokens (Pink Roses) allow us access to his front door - Can be used also for house Munaspa - He’s doing such a bad time learning spells
- The officers of the Yura Muyushka would have keys - The librarian would have it as well LEVEL 4!!!

We return to our place Munaspa Mansion
Lady Micha Munaspa apparently found the other two (2) members of our crew (this is untrue) Lady munaspa is Not Here
Meeting Grim and Curlathrion
Go to the librarian Chuya Hatun Trying to gossip with her The member number fluctuates, thinks there’s 11 right now The members fluctuate because the head grants new keys and takes them away People
The Great Ancient Arboreal Has been here since shortly after the God Eater War Very contemplative, the group can dwindle if he forgets and people die There’s one person in charge of arranging festivals and reaching out Distant Munaspa relative Wood elemental but not, from the war days, might be younger Architect Lomori sprout Aeon who’s obsessed with gardening, hard to find Haven’t seen him this year, scuttles around the city and then one morning you wake up and there’s stairs
Haven’t ever seen him talk to anyone outside the Yura Muyushka Druidic advisors Lady munaspa’s kids all have a kid City advisor to lady munaspa She works mostly with nobility, and retaining elemental-yura muyushka relation In charge of deciding where everyone’s going Like if a group of people wears out the land where to move them next so they can have a less dangerous or fruit bearing place to live Chuya Hatun is nervous, it seems like they’ve had unkind words spoken between them Head of security 10ft tall made of moss and wood and stone Giant? Or troll? He’s really nice, calm and puts people in appropriate security locations Comes and checks on Chuya
Sumaq Ruway Resident artist. John Wife Fucker Comes by to borrow artbooks and profess the beauty of the female form Go investigate bugs Someone has hollowed a section of wood behind the bookshelf
Tunnel chewed into the wood of the god tree None of the Yura Muyushka have come to investigate Scorpions are numbing area while wasp is chewing on the tree Bugs aren’t doing natural behavior, almost certain someone has commanded them to do this Arrive at the end of the tunnel, it is strange and constructed area built under the tree (probably) Group of people, normal people
We recognize one of our companions that we helped not die on the side of the road Teij Nelsi

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 12
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 11
Next: Session 13
Kawsay Everywhere we can kind of see a fire (very small and very contained)
Our friend Teij Nelsi who we kind of spoke to comes over, stops others from panicking Says smth in a language we havent heard (sounds similar to Pyric) “You’ve heard the voice of fire as well?” “Is that why you came here, are you following her call here? I only started hearing it after travelling with you all.” Asks us to have lunch They have meat from killing animals in the forest Have dates and cactus fruit from home “She’s always communicated with me…”
Some call her the Flame Keeper, the Eternal Fire, the Lady of Light and Flame. Benevolent natural spirit of fire, not necessarily an elemental but something like a phoenix But you wouldn’t expect the creature to be able to reach out to people psychically Someone has a staff and several containers of bug lures and foods Large beetle (familiar?) Swivaling head around to pinch anyone who’s gonna touch the owner’s stuff We’re lying about knowing the call of the flame
The Flame Keeper is trapped within the tree, she was sealed away there, and she called us all here to free her Thanks to our help we got more people here than they thought they were able to When they saw the conditions of the city and heard her, assisted those who were making progress here They’ve got a week before we try to set the plan in motion Swarm keeper has spent a long time digging up to important places The wooden dragon are guarding the inner sanctum They think they’ve trapped the flame keeper so they can be anchored here instead of going to the other world Have had a feeling to come here for a while, and after talking with us began to understand why she was called here There’s a map of the tree (several bc tall and wide) tunnels that they’re digging or need to dig About 15 people here, they are all normal and non-elemental Mingling, curly fits right in with some gnomes Gnomes brought a couple people and they heard the voice The third person they had here was taken away by dragons Not everyone here has heard a voice, but most of them heard of a resistance/opposition and were like sure. Okay. you’re gonna light the tree on fire? Awesome i’m in. One has been getting visions, as soon as she heard the voices, she spontaneously learned how to dance?? Curly’s pretty certain its not a phoenix, and the type of dance that the woman showed is an eve of battle dance Some people don’t think they’re gonna die, they have plans to leave and go back altogether to the fire country We could go back with them It seems like the plants here are on top of a thick layer of stone Really old ruins They made an effort that none of the plants are touching the inside of the tree directly They settled here because the plants We ask about the city advisor Not well liked by them either
Her name is Llullay, 2 guards with her Lots of paperwork, shes not well liked and shes not particularly strong Always 2 flytrap leshies with her when she’s at home Shes a type of plant people that have a seed within them that when planted it’ll grow a new person, and that’s where the key is For a gorren who’s lived a really long time, if their seed is taken out and planted, they lose an hour of memory We’re going to jump the city advisor She smells really good, like delicious fruits Trying to steal the key from her Woopsies Fight her We get her seed and the key We’re gonna toss the seed into a toilet and flush it

In general, the Yura Muyushka doesn’t have a lot of security, it just has a lot of rooms where they can house a lot of druids Runs on a skeleton crew of people Sneak in without necessarily tipping off the ones who are in Wine festival in a few days, ppl won’t shut up
At the wine festival (held at the Munaspa Mansion), everyone except maybe a grounds cleaner will be there We go to the YM Headquarters
Sumaq Ruway is studying a plant We find an odd alcove, enter it after disbelieving Go up an elevator Inner Sanctum Odd gateway Warmer further north Someone talking to Mav directly, telling her she has the way to free something. Pleading for help Fire spells activate it, no hotter than before, just really scary
We loudly blame Lady Llullay Voice screams when we leave, 3 eyed humanoid figure
We go to meet the wife Lady Kuyaq Give her the key
She’s “moving into” the tree - putting her soul in there Level 5

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 14
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 13
Next: Session 15 Get on the ship, immediately set sail
“The lady told us to set out as soon as possible as soon as our passengers arrived.”
Captain Wanpaq(sp) has been travelling the seas for 20 years Normally a trade vessel, haven’t had passengers before Mayor’s Wife told them not to come back
We’re the last job to the city HuLang is gathering info 2nd day, we hear noise, loud seal barking Seals causing problems all over They’re hunting something Circling around a series of rocks that have been revealed from low tide A woman with a tail is frantically scooting around the rock to avoid the seals We save her
Her name is Pitani She was collecting kelp bc its her job to craft kelp for those who need to take it to breath underwater, the queen’s been wanting them for some reason
There’s a fortress where the General Yuda is in, asks us to drop her off there Day 3, dark clouds in the distance, and 1 white cloud that’s been travelling near us for the past day or so Storm Pirates??? Sometimes winged men fall from the sky and steal cargo Cloud is similar in shape to one from the Cloud Cities We’re gonna go around the storm clouds As the sun sets, the cloud is slowly descending No flapping of wings Cloud they seem to be taking cover behind isn’t very wispy, it’s very dense cloud shape A glimpse of something shiny, metallic, somewhere near the top Wave at it, someone peeks head up, then ducks back down, a 2nd head, think they’re sneaky We see them clearly tho They’re discussing Something before pulling up beside the ship
They’re under Diskak Tajir
Talk to them, say Diskak is sus (lying) (not lying he asked us to get him a money tree which is certainly treason) (wrong one, that was Thari Tajir) (whoops) We give them some seal and they leave The merlady has been fiddling with a shell, thanks Dol’ore and gives a shell for us to talk into so she can come back and help us if we need help She’s so into Dol’ore lmfao Rest of the journey is calm Land in the port city They’ll stay for a month or two if we want to charter them
Scorching city of Ueyi Atl
In Tlahuiaekatl Lot of buildings built of sand and glass Market town Not the only ship docked here, wooden ships and a metal ship leaving People take 1 look at us, and then Whip their eyes away We wander around to an inn, a man sitting on the porch Stone Oread gives us a friendly way Gives a deep bow
Asks if we’re the king’s champion, Korina Demaki “What other human women women clad in metal armor come into our inn?” Korina is fighting for the old king in the new years tournament If you have a big disagreement you fight it out in front of the gods
His name is Rokka, ancient oread man slowly calcifying Some people have grievances with the king The king’s son is staying at the inn Has got some stuff to finish up and then go to the tournament
Thought he’d throw down for King Atlak Xitlati, but these crazy strong people (our crew) came from out of nowhere and decided to be his champions Don’t speak the local language Son of the original king should be the current king and reunite the empire Tournament is by the great mountain If we’re thinking about going, there’s a route up along the volcanic rocks (pilgrims route) (dangerous, could get swept up in pyroclastic flows) and then a leisurely stroll through the desert (traveller’s route) Festival is 3 weeks away Whoever enters the tournament this year, the champion’s king will become Actual King As we wrap up convo, a person dressed in fine garb with a metal sword Human Very angry, clothes are well-made but covered in ash Ignores Rokka, slams doors
King Zilatis’s son Teicneltiqui Xitlati Stamping out rebellions, finding where the upstarts/terrorists are hiding Dol’ore: “SIR I HEAR YOU’RE HAVING GIRL TROUBLES” Pulls his rapier out, he shoots something fireball-like at Dol’ore, and then goes back Anyone who he thinks is against his father’s rule he attacks Smoke rising from deeper in the city Bats that turn people to stone on the pilgrim’s path (sunny take anti-petrify spell) Dol’ore follows the man, knocks on the door “What do you want??”
Princess of Avasoryd here. We’re trying to find out the ruling body and it would be shameful of someone who attacked a princess before. “The place Korina is from?” Yes! “How’d you get here?” Do you not have mages here? Rule is done by combat where we’re from too, there’s just no difference between gender You’re competing in the tournament?
“I have a 1 on 1 bout to do. I’m getting my wife back.” From who?
“I think he leads the terrorist organization, I think he kidnapped her from my father’s compound. Stole my wife and son away. Lady Korina Panache the root vegetable is fighting in my place.” Your father, is he alive? “Yes” We’ll meet with him then. We want to make sure we get in contact with the correct, rightful ruler right now. “He’s the correct ruler. None of his sons are suitable. He’ll be sending Lady Dimaki in his place.” (Anyone can fight) “Lord Panache is the only one I trust to win.” This guy sucks so bad. So misogynistic and cucked
As we’re leaving, Azar goes “So the stuff you’ve been talking about seems pretty… dangerous. Do you want me to go with you…?? I also got a message this morning, but I figured it wasn’t urgent so I didn’t bring it up while you were docking the ship. The person in charge of the rescue effort has asked me to give a list of loved ones of my squadron so they can tell them what happened to us.”
Could they send Adelaide or Vani? “Is that your loved one?” Yeah Let them know if they come here they may become majesties of a kingdom. “Uhh… sure. But do you have anyone important to you that you want to update.”

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 15
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 14
Next: Session 16
Tlahuiaekatl White sand gives way to volcanic black sand Slowly raise in elevation Kindly marked with pieces of pumice in cairns Many are lovingly painted with red, gold, and orange (sun and fire) Terrain is generally smooth rock or jagged obsidian See a group that is getting obsidian from the mountain Flickering, moving lights, seemingly walking, passing between obstacle and us Flame is too large to be a torch Sometimes when a person burns to death, they rise again as a flaming undead As we continue along, we pick up foot prints and hoof prints ahead Group of people, humanoid with pack animals Some people are moving at different gaits; injured or elderly Reach a collapsed rope bridge over a chasm Too far to cross without effort Over a dry riverbed, 40ft down Catch sight of a few packs and a few baskets that are spilled over Fruit that is still relatively fresh, 2 days old No signs of a person down there, just stuff Rope seems a bit singed Fix the bridge Ash prints begin to follow the precession Getting colder the further up we go Run into a situation, getting colder and snowing Building ahead, partially sheltered by the mountains Stone building See light insight Between us and the building there is a number of the undead that we researched, congregating around the gate Leads to the pathway up to the building This is not a typical amount of snow for this altitude, and this area doesn’t get as cold as a desert should be Very odd to be this cold, not sure why Bell tower, no bell Seems to be a cultural/religious building A number of footprints going inside Get into combat with flaming zombies Bald person in robes looking at us, blank expression Lead us to a Monastery Won’t let the eidolons inside, but allows spellcasting focuses inside Bald monks Some non-monks in here covered in soot and ash, some have changed into robes Eating hungrily Approximately 15 of them Ask where we are
Monastery of Silence There is a small person that has been moved behind a pew, woman covered them in her dress Huddled behind the pew “They say it was founded before the time of the elemental nations.” “There was a time when the nations were all 1 continent. 1 island! And then there was the great war, but it’s said this monastery was from before that time. That’s why not even the elemental nobility dare risk to interfere with these monks.” Monks might worship the snow? No one can really know because they don’t speak These people are nomadic, joining up with cousins and clanspeople Young man of the group went ahead to check out the stone bat cave in the ash maze Stone bats don’t care for offerings, plague people Settled them down here, would clear it out Ash maze is a part of the path that goes underground, filled with smoke and ash from the volcano. There’s a young drake that can be entreated with gifts and she accompanies them through the maze He hasn’t been seen in 2 days Flaming zombies aren’t normal here Offer to go with them, get their guy back This area is always frozen over The Closer to the monastery, the colder it gets A statue at the alter Tall woman with no mouth, maternal What was the world like before when it was a big island? Everyone could travel everywhere, and the lands were mixed together The people had all kinds of heroes and champions, many tales of heroes empowered by the gods Tell a story of what our home is like, we get asked if we can tell the story again later to everyone We collect our items, a steel rapier has been added to the rack
The prince’s Teicneltiqui Xitlati Old man looks sadly at the rapier As we go to leave, monk offers us a finely done tablet with motifs from the walls. Inlaid with silver inside On the road Asking the old man abt the rapier
“It belongs to one of the ‘sons’ of that fire elemental. The boy’s mother is from our clan. I knew that ‘prince’ when he was a little boy. Everytime we’re reminded of him it reminds us of Tehalani.”
“He was a sweet boy, but we didn’t hide him and his sister Teij Nelsi well enough. So that man took notice and took the daughter of our clan and the children.” He’s taken 2-3 women and their children from their clan
He’s not the king anymore no matter how much he calls himself that “A lot of the old traditions of the land rely on the idea that to be the strongest means you have certain rights to things. He’s taken by force or by duel some of the mothers of our clan. The recourse would be to battle for them back. It is unlikely for one of us to succeed in a challenge against him or someone on his behalf.” “There is no one to take the throne when he is finally killed. He is, as far as we know, the last true sentient elemental in the nation. Or, at least, noble. SO if he doesn’t have a child of his own he can’t pass his throne on to anyone and it’ll end when we find him. Not that anyone is planning to kill him. If the children he’s stolen perform well enough, he’ll claim them as heir, but he’s been doing it for a while.”
“[The Prince]’s taken a woman into the compound by challenging her lawfully wed husband to a duel. Now he galivants around that his wife has been stolen.”

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 16
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 15
Next: Session 17
Tlahuiaekatl Statue of a grown woman in monk robes Terror on her face Gorgons, cockatrices, and basilisks can change people to stone Slithering marks nearby Kill a basilisk and some bats Unpetrify both statues Monk missing her tongue, wants to run away and no longer be a monk They even messed with her vocal cords Snowflake looking marks that cover where her voicebox would be Give her new clothes
Calling her Granite for now Get basilisk eyeball Further into the cave Drake Draconic: Alright, show me your gold. Not enough for all of us, but we offer our homeland gold “I am BASICALLY dragon. Big domain!” These were offered to a dragon who was on the biggest mountain. One per person. “If world eating dragon accepts one per person… I guess I can accept 2 coins for 2 people.” The world eating dragon also once requested a rapier of a prince. Drake accepts our coin Drake leads the way Little boy has issues breathing, make sure he does well during the cave
Nelsi Clan offer for us to travel with the caravan to protect them and also who’s encampment gets to take us when we arrive so they want to call dibs
If we have any challenges we need to issue, this clan would be happy to sign off on them and help us into the city Meet with the greater caravan Joyful celebrating Level 6! Granite signs danger when we ask for her actual name

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 17
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 16
Next: Session 18
Tlahuiaekatl
Continuing on the road with Nelsi Clan
Elder Nelsi Introducing us to someone important Really wisened old lady, also see someone within the covered wagon
Beautiful wife Seer Nelsi Discreetly looking at a spot maybe 3ft above our heads Has a feeling she’ll need our skills before the festival “Things are very tense between the peoples of this land, I don’t know if it’ll end in bloodshed before we step foot in the arena.” “There’s no fighting supposed to be done in the area around the city, but the young people don’t hold traditions.” We ask what she’s looking at Whispering Asking her husband if we’re cool and trustworthy, he says yeah “There is someone who seems to be watching you. I see an orb. An invisible orb.” It’s following Dol’ore 6th rank spell Scrying, it seems that whoever it is who casted it is a powerful Arcane or Occult caster She offers for us to stick by her so she can point it out if it shows up again
Little boy comes up to bother Sunny and co. about a flaming rat that his friend went after Footprints look like dog footprints They eventually stop close to a drop off Can’t tell how deep See something flickering down below Slide down, small cave See a fox made of fire Ember fox Fox shaped elemental Convince child to let the fox leave, child wanted the fox as a pet A small white creature Long, with a crown of flowers Crawling its way through the camp, heading towards our location
A stoat with wings (Dide) Retrieves a little letter and places it down
“Hello adventurers/shipwrecked Maronda Shipping Company Employees. Your letters to home require some further explanation. Please follow Sir Dee the Stoat to a secluded location so we can chat further. -Morgan Vurze, CPA”
We go to a tent/cabin that is set up, Avasoryd style Halfling man opens the door “Hello I’m Morgan Vers, certified accountant. Come into my office.” Asks what’s going on
Ask who Adelaide and D’volta are to us Umm so I (Dol’ore) needed a connection back home and didn’t have anyone, and whoever wins the tournament has access to the nation and the various ports, so I figured D’Volta himself would like it. “So you would say groups trying to reinstate monarchies- Do you know anything about the nation of earth and stone?” No. “So you would say that one of the legendary people should show up and become king or give it back to the people?” “Our attempts to get in contact with them don’t always work. Interesting things happening over there.” “I will give you a cool tablet to contact me. My stoat- THE stoat will provide you with the tablet. The company stoat. I will first ensure someone who hasn’t- someone who can just teleport in and enter and that’s fine.” “I’ll check the civil war has cooled down-” What??? “There’s a legendary hero handling it! So I’ll just see if the kingdoms are allied enough to spare him for a trip.”
Lord Vanidicus “I’ll send one of Lord Aomar’s apprentices. They’re kind of weird though.” Weird how?? “He lives in shadow, talks about his feelings. Also a hobgoblin with horse and lance. The bird is kind of busy so he can’t come.” “The Maronda Company Orb. Stop covering it.” The info we give will get us items in proportional value Gives us a knapsack of halflingkind

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 18
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 17
Next: Session 19
City is called Kalikali, sits on a shallow body of water that is almost completely still Bridges that connect across the water to the main city with lots of terraced, ziguruat-shape buildings Many who have chosen to stay camped out instead of going in “We won’t go directly into the city, we’re waiting on people still” “We know the best camps to go to to hear stories from different lands”
Underwater nation won’t set foot here Various encampments coming from different directions Family gatherings/guilds/groups Ask us to assist in setting up camp Basilisk guy is excited about the other warriors coming back soon A familiar face comes gliding over from a nearby pavilion
Thari Tajir
Greeted by Seer Nelsi and Elder Nelsi Hiding an injury, walking with confidence despite it Considering the timeline, we might have smth to do with it He might not be prone to doing us any favors Mav goes up to talk to him He’s pissed Says he went to check on us when things went down, but he’s lying, he has the info from another mean “I do like the story about the adventurer who did more harm than good. As a cautionary tale.” “There’s an interesting one about a phoenix, too.” What’s the story? “You’ll have to come to the storytelling contest to hear.”
“I’m going to go greet my associates that just made the trip from Jatunyana if you would like to join me?” 😬 “Surprisingly big contingent from Jatunyana this year” Why’s that, do you think? “Could be any number of reasons. Mostly people who lived in the Inner Sanctum.” “Just was a place that used to be in Jatunyana.” What happened?
“Someone broke in there, to my understanding, and performed some sort of arcane ritual to merge themselves with the tree. I think it was an escalation of the war between Jatunyana and Tlahuiaekatl to bring a spirit of fire into the land.” Why would anyone want to do that?
“There’s a war. Between nations. And sometimes during war, people commit heinous actions. Like destroying population centers. But those are just my theories from what I heard from the librarian and Llullay.” We go to walk with him He lets out a whistle, a 12ft tall deep blue winged bodyguard comes to walk with us Warrior of some kind Gear is of high quality, runes etched on them Definitely a skilled warrior Detect a subtle mouthing of words in response from her, making sure that Thari is in her line of sight We stop, the bodyguard tries to pull out a weapon, he stops her “Frankly, I don’t think you can afford me, and based on your track record, I don’t want to…” “I am a big fan of hard currency I will say.” “I’d like more information.” What kind? “Motivation, explanation, the who what where and why.” With you we’d be hard pressed if we lie. “I’m just a simple diplomat, I don’t know what you possibly mean by that.” lol
We decide to tell him the truth, that we were doing a favor for the mayor’s wife, we pursued it They weren’t actually married???? She was just the dryad who lived in his house Curiosity got the better of us, we went up, and got voices beamed into our minds after Sunny used a fire spell Asks us if we saw anything avianlike No, large 3-eyed humanoid

Féchín was perched on a tree, 200ft away, writing down notes. First time remembering this Strokes his bird chin “THAT is something” “Who’d you give the key to?” Dryad woman “That explains a lot.” Whaaaat does it explain? “I have to think it over.” “How do you think she knew your name?”
We met a group who came to Kawsay, and we travelled with them and helped them We met a few of them inside a cave below the tree because they were trying to burrow in because they were being summoned by a spirit trapped within the tree that talked in their minds
“I will say you might be interested to know Llullay the goren and their night troll have come along with this time.” Won’t be the one to tell them that we’re here. Understand that even if it wasn’t our intention its resulted in this but we didn’t want this to happen… “I’ll keep that in consideration.” Camps Northern camp Red and gold
Pretty sure accent colors of the prince (Sons of Atlak) To the right Made of gold Literal golden structures Moving freely between Red and gold camp North east 1 tent Standard tent Decorative shield that is red and gold in color and has a half sun on it as the emblem Erected some sort of drying/tanning rack outside the tent Large red scaled pelt hanging from it Center Squat stone tower 20ft Sand around the tower has been turned to stone Man outside doing pushups Aprox 15ft tall Western Jatunyana South western Air Dome

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 19
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 18
Next: Session 20
Kalikali The format of the tournament changes every year so that not 1 way of fighting takes over the country because the tournament runs in a specific way
There is a few commonalities between years tho + knowing that a team of 4 fighters has already been fielded, it probably has some group elements + some info has escaped from within the ranks of Tepetelelki (Followers of the god of the sun and fire who “steward the land” but more accurately steward a few select areas) They have some form of registration, we show up the dawn of the longest day, they tell us what we’re doing, adn then they just Do it. Won’t be allowed to leave until we’re eliminated Seems like it’s angled towards rich non-spellcasters, teehee
Elder Nelsi invites us to go walk around the dunes
“Now, I’m not a particularly pious man. BUT I’ve noticed that each year, the Sons of Atlak, the competition seems to gain more and more of an advantage for them instead of giving everyone a chance. Specifically putting the strongest fighter of the mortal populace at a disadvantage. I’ve noticed as well that the Atlak team/contestant is always… they’ll have some items, or some people entering at a disadvantage, but more often than not they’ll bring exactly what they need for the competition. I’m not suggesting that they would corrupt a holy organization or conduct espionage, but if they were, it would be fair to even the playing field.”
“If you were to subtly ensure that King Towani has what he needs, or that his team have the right people on it, that would be, without directly telling him, that the contest is no longer sanctioned by god” Towani = King Towani, acting ruler of the country. The one that the elemental being wishes to dispose of. “For him to give up having his own sons win and take up foreigners, there’s probably nothing he’ll do to get power and get the throne. That’s an artifact also.”
Granite partially looks like the Prince, like an older half-sister Share the same uncommon eye color of a light amber She seems older by a non-trivial gap (at least a decade if not more), assuming that he has nothing preventing him from aging
Go to Teicneltiqui Xitlati’s tent Has his enchanted metal rapier at his hip Singe marks on the pelt (like an attempt to fireball the drake) Some panicked hacks and swipes, also some stabs from a small blade Pelt was sewn back together to make it appear more in tact Do you not have money for a seamstress? Lmfao We talk to him about like heir situation Grim sneaks into his tent, very meager Clothes, hand made box holds an obsidian knife Are you ready for the duel? “Yes. I am sooo ready. That’s why I’m here. And I have things to do outside the city and hate the peasants so that’s why I’m out here. Away from everyone.” “Where are you staying Princess?”
The Nelsi group, but I may move into the city. “Oh!” Do you have a connection? “I have a… distant… relationship to one of the clan.”
So your mother is from there? “.........Yes. How do you know?” It’s written all over your face. “The old man hasn’t been gossiping again?” Again? “The old man who loves to yap hasn’t been whispering in your ears?” Not particularly. “Huh. Sure.” We helped fight some sort of gorgon and then intimidated the drake you killed to leave us alone so they offered us refuge. “Well, that’s certainly more than what I was expecting of your group.” Yes. They said they would take care of us as one of their own. “Wow. So you’ve become one with the peasants.” And you’ve lost status with them. “Yes, I HAVE gained citizenship among the nobility. I LIVE there, I’m a son of the rightful lord.” And they treat you as one of them? “YES.” But you’re only the 4th in line? “There is no direct and clear ranking of lineage, I am only saying I must be NINTH, because there are 8 people participating ahead of me. There might be 7 actually. So actually 8th if I WERE participating. So who will say if any of those 8 are alive by the new year.” Winks “NOT ASSASSINATION. I just mean if anyone DIES here-” Ok. THE PRINCE SAYS MURDER WILL HAPPEN- “Get your retainers under control lest something HAPPEN to them, princess!” “It is a serious crime to unlawfully obtain information about the tournament before it begins.” (He seems to have an earnest conviction about this, about the fairness of the tournament and that it’s a crime.) “Obviously I am a practitioner of the arcane. I wouldn’t be able to inherit the throne if not.” What spells do you know? “I have… a wide knowledge of spells… but I prefer those which the element of my family. (fire) I can technically cast others but it isn’t- I should say, I am exceptional at casting the spells of my family legacy.” Such as…? “Fireball.” And? “............Many others.” pulls out spell book and leaf through it (thinner than a wizard’s spellbook, but legitimate spellbook) (Lists off several fire spells off the arcane list that are 4th level or lower) So you said it’s unlawful to obtain info abt the tournament beforehand right? “Yes.” Has anyone been punished for it before? Who? “Various peons who sneak into monasteries.” No one higher up? “Not in the last 20 years? Most- Anyone wise enough to lead a group of people is not stupid enough to mess with divine authority.” Not stupid enough to mess with it by their own hand. “Well. I mean. The lord of flame- I haven’t seen anyone smited recently. And the lord of flame would inform the monastery if it happened. That’s how gods work.” And if they knew and didn’t care? “If he knew someone was interfering with his sacred ritual and didn’t care?” I’m just saying, religious orgs aren’t immune to corruption. “Maybe where you’re from that’s the case. But here is different. My father has spoken highly of them considering they’re mortal and druids and such. Not arcane (the best).” “Perhaps investigating the city would be good.” “When do you plan to enter the city. Will you wait for your peasants to go in, or will you go in before them? Or after them?” Why do you want to know? “Out of curiosity for your plans and movements.” “I can assure you that none of the foreign nations will provide better comfort in the desert environment than… though they are peasants, and obviously you wounldn’t be welcome with the Xitlati group. So obviously best to not go with another group. It sounds like a waste of your princesslessly time.” Well I might as well check. “Sure.” Would you like to escort me to the Xitlati group? “Is that a request I can deny, or is that…. An order from a soon to be ruler of a nation.” You can say no but if they ask, I would say I met you but you didn’t walk me over. “I would be willing to offer a small exchange of info… If I were to know you were of kind heart and a good person, then I might… What would you want for you to stay with the Nelsi clan until they stay in the city?” What is the reason? “Obviously they mean nothing to me on a personal level. They have only 1 warrior and you all. If you leave them, they may face retaliation from those that know how poorly defended their camp is.” Who would try to retaliate against them? “Well. Plenty know that they are not trained warriors and since you all obviously were the ones to defeat the basilisk and the cave bats and intimidate the drake (gritting teeth), it would be…. A boon to a group of…. Peaceful, culturally important people if they were to be protected by those outside their tradition of nonviolence.” In exchange for a small favor of course. 2, really. “May I know the favor before I agree?” Of course. But if you know, then we’re conspirators. And if I die or go on death row, I’m ratting you out immediately “Speaking of conspirators, if you would not mention me asking of you…” Of course. Someone of the city is violating divine right, if you could investigate with whatever networks you have to find out who’s doing it, that’s favor one. “That’s a heavy accusation. As a favor to you, I will take it into my heart and pursue it.” If we are attacked and you happen to see, could you find it in your heart to be someone else and fight? “Of course.” (gives him a masquerade scarf) (trade scarves) “I will give you 1 piece of advice. It would be best to introduce yourselves as unaffiliated with me.” It would be best to not know each other, simply discussing varying cultures as 2 royals. Go over to metal group Conjured metal bubbles atop the sand 3 people walking around A section open to the air, showing a number of weapons that contain runes, scalemail
Stuff is marked up 20x what we would by back in Avasoryd A fellow in clothes, jewlry, metal accessories, a metal sword at his hip, a belt buckle Other 2 are moving around in the back He approaches us
“Welcome to our humble sword shop. My name is Exigo of Ferreus. I’m here on behalf of our great nation selling our goods. For a good price. You won’t be able to get them outside of Ferreus. You seem like discerning people who want to pick up more weapons for the upcoming tournament.” Why would I need more weapons? I only have 2 hands “I heard that one year they only did axes.” “We’re the official sellers to the Xitlati group.” “Our metal is better than the local obsidian weapons of the local group.”
Mutata, a cleric, is robed in a dark color, covering the entire body. A slight glow coming from where the eyes should be This fine man wanted me to swing a weapon at you “You wanted to test the quality of the blade? Of course. Are there any you had in mind? I’m happy to explain the enchantments our enchanter put upon them. I see you’re familiar with metalworking, but I don’t recognize the style from anywhere in Ferreus.” (Guy stands there for a second, lights go out, and then turns around to find item to find a very, very nice glaive) Stupid expensive I’m sorry, I don’t have your currency, I only have gold. You know gold? “Of course. A rare metal. Where are you from that a metal is easily acquired?” “I cannot speak on behalf of all, I am too far away to do so, but I can imagine that would be of great interest if you have any contacts that might be interested in trading or anything of the sort with our nation.” We’re acting as legal ambassadors for the premiere trade company of our home “How wonderful. I will offer you the rate we offer for nobles of this land, which is significantly less than those not involved with agreements of ours as a show of faith. Let me calculate what the equivalent to this particular weapon would be in gold weight and then I shall make trade. I am happy to offer suitable weapons to any of you all. It would be my honor.” (Hear a slight whirring noise.) “We have no elemental lord, or governing body in a sense. We make decisions in a collective manner.” Did you have one before?
“We still do in a sense. He stepped down many years ago after the populace requested he do so. Now he helps with trade. Mr Exigo works directly with Mr Vergo Quaestus.” You’ve been selling directly to the Xitlati group? “Yes. We have a direct connection with Mr Quiestus. Their base of operations give access to materials not found in Ferreus. We do not have volcanic activity, at least not natural volcanic activity. So their access to places we could not enter is very helpful.” “The Xitlati group purchased many of our items this year. It’s a great year for us.” What did they end up getting? “Many swords, staves, knives, bows. Many enchanted by our enchanter, the runes etched directly into the metal of the weapons so on the downside they cannot be removed like a runetag, but they are very well made and sturdy.” What did they get enchanted? “The fundamental runes as well as several elemental damage runes that weren’t all fire, which I found interesting. Cold and electricity were very popular this year.” Oh! That’s interesting. “Perhaps it’s hotter this year and having arune to cool you down may help. Our enchanter did a really good job on the electricity runes!” They must know they’re so popular because they’re prestigious. “Yes, I suppose! There doesn’t seem to be any rhyme or reason behind their business.” “I will say that as good customers, I wanted to let you know there is some dangerous contraband (metallic inventions) that have been found. We think the dealer will be here attempting to pass them off as quality items. If you see any, please let me know so that I may ensure that this is put a stop to and no one gets injured and that the reputation of our craftsmen stays good and they get the recognition they deserve.” Of course! “Excellent. Many thanks.” How long will you be here after the tournament? We will head to the Xitlati compound and then heading home. We will enter the city to ensure that we don’t miss the culprit from our bridge stakeout. We also have many sales to make here, and the sons of Atlak have more of their compatriots… followers is not the right word. Friends! I guess. Of the brothers who might be making some purchases.” Oh! Are they on way? “I think so! The party next door seems to get rowdier every as they imbibe before their ritual combat.”

sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.title: Session 20
sessions/sailors-of-the-shattered-seas/s.description:
Prev: Session 19
Next: Session 21
Kalikali Something has been written on our chalkboard
“Urgent message from desk of Director D'Volta Aomar. Keep your eyes on the tablet. Each hour we’ll continue the message. Erase each message immediately when read.”
Sons of Atlak group They are much more carefree and lively, they seem very excited for the tournament, glory, etc
3 men dressed in the colors of House Xitlati, various others Intently watching
One with a spellbook is watching the Nelsi Clan camp as if he’s waiting for something to happen We want to talk to the one in charge “Who are you?” Lord Zonte, soon to be leader of 2 nations (tall man with handwraps who’s eyes glow a gentle red, towering a bit above Dol’ore) “Why don’t we step away? Is there something wrong with speaking here? “I am one of the three most righteous sons of Atlak.” A fellow warrior lord.
“Are you all from the Jatunyana coalition? A princess of Ferreus?” Wild pale yonder. The great big bubble. The lost continent. “You learned our language very well.” A lord needs to know the language fot he land she may rule “So you’re here to sign up and join your comrades?” No, I’m here to sign up and they’re to join me. “That’s not the case, they’re signed up to fight for the true lord?” Oh, they’re not worth worrying about “Sure” Who are you referring to?
“Korina Demaki and group?” The one with the green eyes? “Yes of course” (He doesn’t actually know) “Tall armored woman with green eyes. Obviously.” The one with the green eyes was a monk, like yourself. “They… don’t have a monk among them.” Then it must be a different group “Are there more of you out there?” Of course! “So you’re here to win the tournament for your own nation?” I want to win adn then give it away. “To?” Whoever wins my favor. She is quite strong! “I’ll send word, and see what we can negotiate together.” “If you want to step into our camp. It’s not often we get other royals in the land.” “My name is Ima the Perfect.” “My brother here would be happy to trade spells with you all. I’m interested to see what you carry from your land. I’m sure you could teach us much.” We have 6 whole archwizards working in harmony. “We have a 7th too. Everyone, this is Lady Zonte and retainers, they are from far yonder in the lost world. They speak our language exceptionally well.” (Some convos stop in the distance now that they know we can understand.)
“Solviatle, master of the element of fire, and Chicatok who is the most serious combiner of arcane and martial disciplines. No one is better than him.” (Introduce ourselves, include extra people who aren’t here) “You haven’t brought any clerics by chance?” Three. “We’d love to bring them to our teams.” What gods do you worship, if any?
“Elemental fire, as he has by far the most influence than any other deity. If any would grant us favors, it would be him.” (Tlekomoktli) Where’d your epithet come from? “I have perfected my physical being. It is the belief of those who have seen me that is the case.” Those who have seen you were paid by you “Haha. Of course.” (Wizard, Solviatle, moving his mouth without it audible, distracted) Curly comes up to distract, he’s actively participates, but he leans around briefly to look at something out 500ft away in the desert No one actually standing there, has to stand tall because she blocks the angle downwards They make reference to false worship of couatls to Dol’Ore Questions Curly - Not often that there are siblings to work together when only one gets the glory, how do you get along? “We have bigger, worse fish to be frying. We’ll take care of it later.” (All filled with hatred toward others than against each other. Don’t all look related, united by another common cause/circumstance than blood.) Dol’Ore - What exactly is your training schedule to be perfect? Despite the bragging, he’s probably a better spellcaster than the magus. They’re probably better than us, but they have a lot of guys Dol’Ore - how does allying work if only one wins? If we were to fight and we were allied, would I just throw? “Many fight. If you were to ally us, we could ensure you have comrades to fight alongside no matter what they decide for the teamwork to be this particular year. If we were to fight against each other, we still want to know who’st he best among the family. We’d give it our best and congratulate who moves up.” Thought we might gang up on one person in a battle royale! “If that were to be the format, sure.” Can I know the plan so that I don’t make an allegiance in that case?
“Obviously the most important is King Towani who will be much less of a threat without his spear this year.” King who? “Towani. He’s the one who won in years past. The Usurper.” Is it usurping if he did it legally? “He’s aligned with forces that aren’t elemental.” Gods? “Not gods per se.” Non-elemental forces, very shameful. “Who knows what part of his soul he’s given up for such sudden and legendary strength.” Sunny - Any other specialized spellcasters? Yes! Grim - “We have fighters from every nation. We’re putting aside differences with Jatunyana in their time of need. They’re here to help restore the rightful ruler in the tournament, we’re here to assist with any issues they might have back home. Water is not welcome, air always visits, stone is not here on official capacity. He’s… not representative of typical attitudes, might be good to take his words with a grain of sand.” Excuse ourselves and step away to check message
“The Lords are trying to expand the overlap between our plane and theirs. They plan to open and alter “Suppression Anchors” somehow. I need” Okay Notice a group of people filing into the encampment, they’re bald and the air has a distinct chill to. They move in complete silence Begin to set up a large camp to the right
Mav goes to Granite’s tent to check in
She passes by asthma kid and mom leaving “We’re just gonna go take a stroll, maybe learn about some of the local plants and rocks.” Oh. Stay safe! Do you guys need an escort? Going around? “We’re not visiting tents, we’re going out to the natural canyon, and no, we don’t need an escort. Don’t trouble yourself.” Not trouble! Goes to granite
The mom comes out from Seer Nelsi’s tent “Don’t come any further, I have to tend to Seer Nelsi’s tent!” The other mom turns the corner with the son (maybe copies) She closes the tent behind her to stop anyone from seeing anything In the meantime, at the stone tower 10ft tall guy made of stone Jumps to his feet upon seeing us Loudly, “Greetings! What brings you by my tent!” Meeting the other warriors!
“Wonderful! I’m Ter Kuat!” What number were you on? “I don’t keep count! It’s more meditative, so whenever I need to think about a problem or get apprehensive I keep doing this!” What were you thinking about? “My partner hasn’t arrived yet! It’s sad to fight with a single half!” Who’s your partner?
“Ter Cibar! Escorting people back here that haven’t arrived yet, and despite doing the right thing, I’m worried.” (He’s a textbook description of a Jibali.) Is your partner also a stone geni? “No! He’s a mortal man.” Is he from the Nelsi clan?
“No! Sthira! We are not welcome to return, so we travel!” Why? “I gave up my immortality!” Ok cool! “I still have the appearance and many abilities of my elemental nature!” Why’d you do so? “1. For love. 2. What is the reason to live forever holding your age if you experience nothing? It’s better to live to the fullest and die!” Noble! “Separating myself from- I could not travel with my person if I were still tied entirely to the earth so I became, through accident, mostly, something else. My eternal father is upset! But he can’t get me here, so.” Who’s your father?
“The so called rightful lord of S’thira, Catajunga. He spent 500 years hewing me from stone to be the perfect son to follow to enforce his perfect order. Unfortunately, it did not work. He was not skilled enough to make a perfect being.” “He considers himself to be perfected, so who knows how many people’s souls were crushed to make me.” They just shoved souls into the stone to make you? “My understanding! Upon learning that a lot was sacrificed to make a perfect backup in case the armies of change came knocking upon his door, I was so abhored that I banished the specifics from my mind so that no others may do the same.” Oh! How’d you do that? “Magic! I allowed those resisting my father to look into my mind and take any memories they wish from it and learn all they can so that they could find a way into his eternal vault.” They have ur memories now? “They know the contents, and promised that they erased things lost to time, such as how to make a stone son without connection to the plane of earth.” (If what he says is true that this area is not properly connected to the plane of elements to shape a new child/procreate with another similarly powerful djin.. There’s all sorts of way to make people, maybe there are ways to make new elementals? Though without the obvious forms, it would have to be something drastic.) “I think its similar in a way to creatures of undeath. I do not know, I have done my best to return fragments of souls so that they may rest and that I may die with the one I love. The grievous damage of the act can never be undone. So now I must put as much joy into the world as I can and fight for the things that make it better. See if I can honor the sacrifice of the.” “To make new life means to take of the finite resources upon this plane.” Are you participating or just waiting? “I do! Hopefully my partner will use his connections to tell us who we will be fighting for this year. It would be deeply irresponsible to rule this nation.” Do you want to fight with us? And we can duke it out once we win. If your partner doesn’t arrive, of course. “Only if I know who you’re entering the tournament.” Lost continent. “That’s really cool, I’d love to visit there and meet the warriors” We could bring you. Don’t feel pressured. “Much appreciated, I will pray for his safe return in time and I shall see if any of those I have fought with as comrades I shall consult for whom we raise our fist.” Are only stone elemental lords made that way, or all elemental lords? “I must assume that they are all reliant on squeezing mortal souls for energy. For power. Flesh. I’m not sure the key component, I would think the soul. I don’t know how the other lords make their children, I suspect this lord was not passed the secrets down.” SO if he were to die, the cycle ends here for fire? “Why else do you think he’s so desperate?” How tragic. “The crown gives him a great deal of power. The church follows the crown here.” There are some old loyalties, right? Someone else has the crown now, right? “He’s an incredible warrior. I am a strong warrior. I contain many strong warriors within me who I would like to honor by continuing to hone their skills. This mortal man has created- he has become a legendary warrior through his own actions and deeds. The people’s beliefs in him.” I don’t think you should be disqualified, it what you do with your life that matters. You’re also great.
“I have sparred once, several years ago. My partner and I stayed in to assist in a rescue in a cave system and I have the power to punch through stone. Afterwards, as part of our reward, King Towani beat us both with ease and without question. I hope he is still alive, should he remain a man loyal to the people.”
What did you think of Atlak Xitlati?
“It was a fair win. It was that year that I 1v1’d til the end with Xitlati's Father, there was a fight to the death. I don’t think I’ve seen another year with slaughter in the years. Towani swept the head from the elemental lord, his glaive shown like the sun.” Could we talk somewhere in private? “Would you like to enter my stone hut?” Sure. (Mav arrives back)
(I let granite know about the monks, and I ran into the mom and the boy. They seemed fine, but they told me they were going out for a walk, i let them go. That same mother came out from Seer Nelsi and came to warn granite. Have the djin watch over the camp while we go in the direction the mom and kid go) Track her, she carried the kid and sprinted Come across what was a small camp and the tracks diverge in 2 directions. Cart/sand sled lead in 1 direction, a pair of solitary footprints. Just before entering the camp, the weight changed of the person Plant “They put the little loud one on their leaf and dragged him away on the leaf. They pulled the leaf across the sand.” Was it going really fast? “They made the little creature not so shouting and sleeping instead. They took the leaf stem and pulled him like a little droplet of water on a leaf.” Was it actually a leaf? “It looked like one to me, I am a cactus.” Oh it’s been an hour “need you to find out what those are, what they’re doing with them, and how to stop it. - They need something called the “Covenant” “Missing Child from camp will do it return for that favor. He is on a leaf.” The stoat appears with a bag that drops at our feet Ship with wheels and sails in a bottle to break Clearly made with great skill, but also cobbled together very quickly. Looks to be both a boat and a cart Child is: In this country, in the serpentine canyon, in a hidden hollow by a tree split in half by a storm Send dol’ore up, she sees a dust cloud of their hustling across the sand They are maybe a mile away, catch a glimpse of green With dusk drawing near, this is possible where they’ll stay for the evening Woohoo big boatcar

D'Volta Aomar message “of Silence” kept intact to protect themselves, see if you can’t exploit that. You seem to be under their radar right now, stay that way” Have to go in on foot Supplies are essentials for surviving in the desert Some kind of fiend, the sand around its feet is moving slightly (30ft around it) Has a pendant/piece of jewlery that its breaking apart and crushing Eyeball squinted in anger Knock out the captain, a grunt surrenders, a man explodes, a rat explodes, and the corpse of an Agash we killed is there

Fiends are more common in avasoryd than here Back to the boat Load all supplies up into the ship Find notes on the captain Another message “as much as possible, never let your real goal slip and watch who you trust. You have been followed by a shape changer, it isn’t” Guard “Thank you for freeing me, I didn’t realize that when I signed up it was lifelong commitment.” Lots of shitty bosses out there. “I’m getting the picture…” Why’d you kidnap a child?
“The lord Atlak Xitlati typically, not in all cases, if the mother is hard to get to, they’ll take the child and leave a message letting her know that the only way to see her child again is to come with us. And go to the compound.” You were fine with that? “Um. Uh. Yes, I guess. It didn’t start with child kidnapping.” What did it start with? “I mean, I was given- I was a farmer, but one summer maybe a year or so ago, all the water dried up and we could no longer really feed ourselves. Some of the lord’s men passed by and they told us they just happened to be in the area and told the ablebodied farmers that if they came to work with them, they’d ensure comfortable lives for our families, and I didn’t- at first, I didn’t think it was- I had doubts. But then my neighbors started signing up and their spouses and children would receive packages of food and water every week. The men would come visit home and be able to see them after a few weeks of being a guard. I watched for a while, watched my family get ill and starve and figured that this was the best way to make sure they had food.” What was up with the demon? Sorry. Devil. “The weird eye guy?” The one [Dol’ore] killed. “He couldn’t curse you by looking at you? He said he was an a djinni of some kind who was seeking revenge upon the mortals that killed him.” Could he do it again? “IDK. he spent time with the captain.” Do you have any other discernible skills? “Wearing this armor has made me pretty hardy?” Not a skill. “I can’t read or write… I know a lot about the land?” How fast did the drought come on? “The wells all went dry one day and the river dried up.” And it was a proper drought? Instead of desert conditions? “We figured the river had been diverted or dammed somewhere up stream. We tried to go as far back as we could, but it was a rockfall or avalanche that did it.” When was the last time you were home? “7 months ago and 4 days?” What’s your name?
“Pialia. WAIT. I went inside the main compound 3 times! I can help guide you there! I know a lot of the area in that region!” What about when we leave? “Can you drop me off with my family or…” Yeah we can do that
We have a lovely group of people we’re staying with, they’d LOVE to have someone with your expertise “I’d love to guard normal people?” They’re nomadic “Yeah that’s good I’m HAPPY to do that.”

You’re not going to speak unless I tell you. D: We’re your closest allies right now. “Well. I think there was- the ratfolk camp back 5 days ago, didn’t pan out great. King’s not fan of rats. Running out of human settlements to go raid.” D: Great. D: You do know how many of us are here? “You didn’t even know about the baby until I told you.” “So what do you want from me?” D: The basic information. “They can see me, so…” “Mr. Xitlati can only drag so many shapechangers out from his hideyhole.” “My talents are very unique.” (Desert mouse peaking out from a burrow, sunny goes around and kicks holes) D: Where’s the original? He had a knife, and he tried to attack me. We had a skirmish. I put him in a trunk and buried it in the sand in his tent.” D: you’ll probably be killed if you go back. Her name is Xoco
“So. yes there’s only one druid order in the city? We all study the path of flame, but many have different interpretations what that might mean and that ends up with those who look to the lady of gentle sunlight and those who look to the lord of burning vengeance. We have different opinions on things. I work for the Lady of Gentle Sunlight.” “[the others] have symbols of flames. I hope to embroider a kind of wheat that’s hardy in the desert on my robes.” “Kidnappings would start an internal sect war of the tepetalelki women” “There is a flower growing contest if you want to come see my entry!” The guy’s robes are intentionally plain and standardized, her robes were done by her own hand so mistakes and errors. A few attempts to make a sun look like a flower He is tattooless 19 looking Does have fucked up hands from digging He had to dig himself out from underground and it fucked up his hands and wrists There are little circular divots in his back that aren’t scar tissue but they are injuries that seem like they were healed by magic immediately (perfect skin), roughly in the shape of a poker Oldest is from 5 years ago Aelius goes to ask the monks to dispel magic on the guy Monk comes in, dispells magic, leaves The 19 year old wakes up “I was really trying to return that kid back to camp.” (totally lying) “I work adjacent to the guys who just tried to blow your shit up?” Theyre dead “Great” Why were you trying to come after us? “It wasnt you guys specifically, it was the guys you travel with?” Why them in particular “I work with the brothers” Who’s your boss? “Cant tell you.” All it takes is that we send word out that you helped us and your dead anyways “Damn. and i was so close to….” If this succeeded, were you gonna get promoted? “They didn’t explicitly say it, but… it wouldve given me enough leverage to push for that soooo”
“The Sons of Atlak forces attacked yall, i was there doing some kidnapping.”
“Atlak Xitlati grateful, king tell boss, king says yeah you can be in charge now. I get to be in charge, i get to do my office job, and i dont have to be a minion.” Was this attack your idea or?
“I was just hanging out here man, with the atlak besties, i may go hang out with the nelsi prince.” How many times have you tried kidnapping people? “5 times? I was gonna give up, but then i met this stupid kid.” “Im sure my best friends have an easier time with stuff.” They cant leave druid stuff, city take baby, raise it, baby adult now, baby sworn to secrecy and the druid rites. I could walk away if i wanted to but l wouldn’t have the support” Next steps? “I go back to the city, my new best friends show up to my organization, i make you seem all cool” We let him go do that Around dawn, 4 giant beetles with 3 people and a large bag/box come through the east
Familiar woman, Teij Nelsi A man A completely hooded robed figure who is gesturing and signaling to the beetles “Uncle, what happened?” “Ohhh my child you return. You seem different?” She is a little different Carries herself slightly different, her voice has an undertone of crackle of the hearth, like a 2nd echo when she speaks Looks at us, “oh i didn’t expect to see you all again, i thought you all didn’t help the common folk.” Not any illusions, but has power
“The Lady of Eternal Rebirth has a gift she wants to present to you. Is the fire one with you right now?”
Azar?? “The lady of eternal rebirth wants me to hand the item to him directly, it’ll alleviate what he’s going through right now.” Wdym?? “I’m sure he’ll tell you when he’s ready.” “She thanks you for your role in her creation.” Are you just here to present gifts and ask about someone in our party before or? “Oh, I’m here to kill Atlak Xitlati.” I didnt realize you got so strong “I was the only one willing to hollow out their soul and make room. I don’t need to live much longer.” Are you.. Okay? “Some need to sacrifice for the greater whole. Someone needs to help my people, and whatever happens to my body after, happens.” (she’s speaking in metaphor-ish, its kind of a deal with a devil. Bargain with a powerful entity, give something precious to you in exchange for a huge boost in ability.) What were you doing travelling with tercibar and your other friend?
“We met Ter Cibar on the side from Jatunyana, we were the only two who got out successfully. As far as i know.” “We’ll get my friend the help he needs, so we’ll uh. Win the tournament.” “We have plans, we made exchanges, i don’t trust you, i’m not going to tell you. Hopefully it’ll affect the lives of everyone in this fucking nation.”
Keeper of Swarms “I don’t particularly want to speak to you, you slaughtered my companions, so.” I dont think it was intentional? “You stabbed them, so.” They leave
Elder Nelsi “i think it seems you’ve wronged my clansmember in some way and she is very different now. She has always believed that our traditions are important to preserve but not sustainable, so she picked up the staff at an early age and decided that she’s no good at telling stories, so instead she would taint her hands and soul with violence to allow the rest of us to live by our ideals. It seems whatever happened when she travelled away to find the spirit of the phoenix has changed her immensely.” C: you dislike the change? “I dislike someone I raised assassinating people and burning herself from the inside.” “I hope she and her brother don’t run into each other.”
“If only their mother was still alive- their mother is resting and is not still alive to see this.” “I will say, i can’t imagine teij has been in the loop with what’s happening with the tournament. She’s been wandering the desert, clawing through the jungle. I don’t even know how they made an agreement with the monks. Well. Let’s go into the city, I have to talk to my wife about this.” Into the city Built over a lake
