SInce there is another mortal here, who are you aligned with, Sir Touani?” “Wdym” “With the mortal realms. Are you aligned with any of the kings?” “Uh. I mean. I guess so???” - says THE KING? NON TYRANT KING TBC “I’m aligned with the interests of the people unless theres other kings I don’t know about??” “I just fear what I have to say may be a conflict of interest. Idk if it will affect destiny but I understand that you wish to hear it. However, destiny doesn’t like being heard by onlookers. THe more ppl know, the more it tends to affect the course of action itself” “I mean. Fair enough, I suppose. Teij, you okay with me heading out? You wanted to tell me smthn?” “Uh, well I’d much rather be having a convo with YOU and not these OTHER people.” - Teij “Okay cool, we’ll all stay. You’re going to die, that’s the first part of destiny.” - D “WHAT? Little Teij??? What she must be like, fifteen??? No… uhhh” - Touani “Let’s not get into specifics but its her destiny.” - D “Well it’s everyone’s destiny to die.” - Teij “Is it in the destiny of everyone to die in 2 months time?” - D “No, I see your point” - Teij King Touani: what has this small child been up to. She is a grown woman “You hate us for our inaction at the tree, correct?” - D “Yes, your inaction.” - Teij “What about the action of helping the Nelsi people, is that anything or do they not matter to you? I understand you’ve been gone for a while.” - D “I’ll have to speak with them and see what exactly happened and what specifically was done, but sure, if you helped them, that should count for something.” - Teij “So it’s my destiny to die, knew that, anything else?” - Teij
“Potentially killing the tyrant king.” - D Touani has a little like. Linguistic revelation about tyrant vs king and stuff Xochi looks at him goes SHUT UP! DESTINY! “This could also be destiny. A chance meeting to change the title of the ruler forever.” - D “That’s certainly’ something that needs to happen soon. We have maybe another 10 good years…” - Touani “10 years?” - D “I’m getting up there in years! I still look quite handsome but I’m old!” - Touani Good looking 60 year old (Like Majima) His appearance doesn’t betray his fear that he will stop winning tournaments soon He’s already doing pretty good though for his age “I think I can keep going for another 10 years, but it gets closer and closer every year. I’ll have to find someone to take over after me.” - Touani - “I came to talk about the tyrant. Must he die in the tournament? In your plan?” - D “He’s not going to fight in the tournament, we’re going to get rid of the person he sends and the Tpetlelqi won’t throw everything into civil war, and THEN we show up to his compound.” - Teij “Why in that order? We already have legal claim to the throne.” - D “I thought you had to win the tournament.” - Curly “I did, I think I can do it again this year if I pull myself together.” -Touani “They’re cheating though” - D “We need to fight honorably, this is an important religious event.” - Touani “They are affecting destiny tho” - D “I have faith that before the gods it will be exposed, just as it has been in years past. They won’t win against me, things will stay as they are for another year. We’ll have claim to the throne, no disputes, no one else will get the throne.” - Touani “Staying the same as it was last year is the PROBLEM. I know you think we should fight him on the battlefield as you did his father, but they dont even do battles to the death anymore, why do you think that is, and also hes NOT GOING TO SHOW UP, I know you think if you keep fighting his minions he will have to show up and it’ll be all honorable, but he is NOT AN HONORABLE PERSON” - Teij “Would you say he’s a person who cares abt his image? One of a person in charge with power?” - D “Hes a Fucking Cockroach, the only thing he cares about is preserving his lineage and it keeps going and we are all under the thumb of the elemental lords for the rest of our fucking lives” - Teij “I have proof his lineage is fallable. I have the corpses of three of his sons” - D “Good work, nice.” - Teij “I did it while saving the nelsi clan” - D “Oh. That explains a lot.” It seems her opinion is changing. She will not say sorry. “So. His sons. Their corpses” “Rotting in the streets, proof that he doesn’t care about them or any of his future sons” “He will probably just disown them, to him the sons are disposable, dont even get me started on the daughters, but he wants an ELEMENTAL son, and hes convinced since he had a human mother, somehow that will work out, that there will be a kid who is an elemental, meanwhile he is letting these kids who were raised in his compound believe that they somehow have a chance of being the heir to the lordship.” - Teij @ Touani, Dolore: “Do you have any children?” “Uh no.” “Then why not allow those who wish to to fight for the honorable king. Take the children from him and raise them as your own.” - D “Woah, idk that i’d make a good father” “Its easier than being a king.” “It’s not hereditary, the actual throne” “Naturally, they’d have no reason to not defect from Atlak. It’s not like they’d have any more claim to the throne” “Idk about a raid on the compound or like starting an orphanage. Teij are there more adults out there?” “Yeah probably, unless you killed them all. Which ones did you kill?” - Teij “(Lists them off).” - D “Oh,, okay! I mean theyre assholes, there’s definitely at least another adult running around. It’s not that hard to open your eyes the second you are exposed to ideas that are outside what you know.” “We already have one that is slowly coming to us.” “Which one” “Cant say” “I mean yeah, I’d let anyone who wants to fight under my banner on my behalf join, anyone who wants to serve the will of the people and wants out from under the thumb of elementals is welcome to take the crown. NOT THAT I DONT WANT IT” - Touani “Well, if he wont come out for that, wont come out for his own children… His own children must know where he is?” - D “I know where he is.” - Teij “And you wont tell us?” - D “I just told you I know where he is, I negotiated a deal on getting in there. There is a back entrance, that is my next stop after making sure everything is as stable-” “He will run.” - D “True..” - tej “If you really want this to end and help the people, she needs to kill the king, you need to win the tournament.” - D “Iuhuhhh,,,, uhm,,, that doesn’t… you know, I’m just going to fight in the tournament and I am not going to know about anything else going on, so I’m going to go practice with my uh… my glaive, now. Have a great day.” - Touani Gonna go be willfully ignorant of whats going on
“I will say, there is a problem. If Touani happens to lose and Atlak takes the throne… I don’t know how rules are connected to the lands they are over… In your land, but…. Do you know of the Monastery in the mountains? That’s the entrance to get to the compound…” (Monastery of Silence is days away from the city ⅔ weeks away) If we go to the compound to fight, we cannot spend too much time in the city. We can’t go to any of the events No flower growing contest :( Trying to get Touani to fight as few people as possible/Get those fighting for Atlak to fight anyone at all Tournament Participants: Doppleganger Fox Guy Guy with hand cut off Captain No-Back Touani Ter Kuat (the goat) Ter Sibar
Svodrird Dawnbrand Roleplay Pile (convince them to fight)
Elder Nelsi (because its funny) (convince him)
Seer Nelsi
Teicneltiqui Xitlati]
Xoco (Disseminating messages)
Chun CanXiao Undecided
Keeper of Swarms Stay in town no fighting
Tiachia + Asthmatic Son
Poliulius and Koltia We leave them OUT OF THIS
Thari Tajir
The other Jatunyana people Thari Tajir’s body guard Boat Time:
Granite (Too easy to kidnap) Teijnelsi Koltia’s shop Georgeous obsidian daggers displayed on top shelves, other generic items, standard weapons, hardware Ticking noises at the back of the room? Old people We hear whisper-heated-conversation in the back of the room along with the monotone voice of the Swarmkeeper “Hi! You can come in, they’re right in the back, close the door behind you.” - Tiachia We go upstairs There is a man bent over a table of metal scraps and stones Seems to be making complex devices with the metal Small sleeping newborn wrapped around his chest!! - Puts his big glasses on his head Elder Nelsi and Swarmkeeper are engaged in a heated whisper debate behind him
Ajakatl and toddler are cuddling with Koltia “How did your conversation go!” - Elder Nelsi “We’re on good terms” - D “Oh thats great” - Elder “Do you wana do this elsewhere so we do not disturb” - Curly “Yeah sure” - Elder Bub away downstairs “I’m very gladdened to hear it went well! So, what’s next? Shall we participate in some cultural events?” - Elder “Well, we have some plans that require some very swift action, so we may not have time to participate in some events. We came to speak with you in the time we have.” - C “Ok” “One of the plans we are hoping will pan out requires some stalling. We’re hoping you can help with that.” - C “Like a filibuster? I’m good at speaking, where do you need this to happen?” - Elder “Where better to have it than in the midst of what you are protesting?” - Curly “Eh…?” “We hope you would enter the tournament as a symbol of keeping peace. You need not fight or wield a weapon so much as be there as a symbol.” - C “You know what, Curly? You make a great point!” (nat 20 on diplomacy) “I will resist nonviolently and if they injure a feeble old man… yknow maybe I’ll go get my wife, we’ll do it together! Will you all be participating together?” “We have a mission elsewhere.” - D “We are attempting to dismantle the tournament from another angle. You will be helping by stalling the tournament.” - C “Oh! With Teij! I see, good luck with that! Hehehuhu! I won’t tell my wife, don’t worry.” - Elder Nelsi (Got Elder Nelsi, Seer Nelsi, and some other adults from the group to join as a nonviolent protest) “Can you say something in our language to convey a message to those from my continent?” - D “Yeah! Totally! We could end all our translation services with that phrase if it would be helpful.” Could be! - D Okay what’s the phrase?
“The lord you’re working for will destroy our home if he wins. Support the Serpent-Feather King. The tyrant has blocked all of your messages.”
We go find Teicneltiqui Xitlati to talk to him “Uh, hello there, all” “Your lady.” - D “Your lady, princess…” -T “Your lady is fine.” - D “What can I do for you all this fine day?” - T “Theres is a tournament.” - D “I know.” - T “The man courting your wife is entering.” - D “Oh. She has a new husband???” - T “Yeah” “Thats unexpected” “Why?” “What happened to her old husband?” “Uh.; what? The inventor is entering.” “What???” “It’s to show the Nelsi people are resisting. Its a protest.” “Huh. And… uh… good for him I guess? Good for him to have a plan if he wins our bout and lives somehow?” “So you’re planning to kill her husband and she’ll waltz right into your arms?” “In the eyes of the law.. My father said…” “You murdered your own brothers!” “Your father sucks!”
“He’s going to kill you, us, the Nelsi clan. You’ll be winning the hand of a corpse.” “A…h…” “Have you considered.. Not killing the husband of the woman you still have feelings for in order to get her back? Have you tried flowers?” “I mean… Yknow, I’m starting to have my views on women expanded a little bit! Now that I think about it… I issued the challenge last year and the little weasel escaped and now he’s confined to the city, said we’d do it this year. I did declare in front of all it was a grievance that could only be solved with one of our deaths.” “Imagine how honorable you’d seem if you took it back and didn’t kill him.” “I mean this is a state sanctioned solving of grievances. This is the law. It’s an important tradition.” “What do you think ur going to get out of killing the Hus of the woman u love?” “Revenge” “Okay what for? She’ll hate you more” “Stealing the woman I love after she left.. Thats … not stealing. I mean… they have a lot of interesting ideas where youre from, princess, about what liberties women should have.” - Teiq “Do you really want to do this” - Mav “WHAT EVEN DO I WANT ANYMORE! People these days they wont even let you kill a man in ritual combat!!” - Teiq “What will win her heart, killing her husband or helping her people survive?” “Theyre MY people” “They were.” “She’s from a clan of weaponsmiths!” “And yet she stands with the Nelsi and you do not right now. If this offends you, we can fight over it.” “You make… some points. Alright, I’ll… I’ll call it off. Forfeit, I suppose. Still, my father has directly banned me from participating in the festivities here.” “And why would you listen to him? Is he the current king?” “You……….. You know, while fratricide isnt frowned upon in our family, I’m starting to have some questions.” “We typically dont do that. One should not kill their family, it’s bad for the soul.” “SO you suggest i join the tourn NOT representing my father, but ensuring that Ripposte and his group dont win on behalf of my father?” “Of course. You could even fight for yourself, but the current king would guarantee your and the Nelsi’s safety.” “I’ll fight for myself, then.” Preview of next session Heading down the street Approached by Pol’s mom (weaver) + a merchant looking person with an entourage of people behind him Hobgoblin perhaps? But no, he’s not moving his feet, he’s gliding. Quite tall. This guy is iced the fuck out, covered in gems and minerals of the nation of fire
“Helloou!! My name is The Great Merchant Kousaltli! I have heard you have done us a great service! You have finally brought to justice Pontificus the Genocider!” … uh. what?

Poliulius’s mom with a guy decked in jewelery and a little bit of gold Significantly more of a status symbol than back home Might be a hobgoblin, but thats not possible Upon further inspection, he’s gliding with long robes. Elevating himself to our eye level and then another inch or or so to be slightly taller
“Helloooo! My name is The Great Merchant Kousaltli! I have heard you have done us a great service! You have finally brought to justice Pontificus the Genocider!” Who??? “Pontificus the genocider!” Who??? “Suicidally genocidal goblins that pertook in the killing of innocents. It was their goal to take revenge on all tall humanoids and myself bc of my betrayal of their ideals! But youve brought the scourge to justice, so i can operate again without worry of 100 fireballs reigning above.” “Thank you for your great service!” “The great merchant wishes to imbue upon you gifts and the knowledge should you ever need the merchant tunnels of this nation that we are at your service! For your great and noble deeeed. So i have commissioned very swiftly i had 10 of my greatest artisans work on it at the same time so itd be done in 2 hours- no 6 hours since i got the news and found you all. There is this beautiful. Plate. Celebratory robes.” “And i must bestow upon you some currency to speeend. It will beeee [2k gold]” “The great merchant the people are forever indebted to you, you only call upon us and we will see what we can do for youuuuu~!” “And how would we call upon you? “This armor will indicate to all my union members you have done us a good deed. It has the symbol of our trade organization, you need only approach one of our union members, and tell them you are in need, and they will help .For example, we run through tunnels through the nation to avoid the perils of the desert.” “Are these tunnels well known or are they tracking you They are secret to the guild but I knew Pontificus the Genocider before the guild. We discovered the tunnels together and we disagreed on how to use them. I desired to use them for trade, he wanted to use them for conquest. Myeeh. “So uh,,,, why was he mad at you??” “He felt I betrayed his ideals by employing small, medium, and perhaps even large members into my guild, and not simply taking a slow approach and not taking the first opportunity to move our people out of the underground system we lived in at the first opportunity, which did cause some suffering in the time it took us to make accommodations for the people who were too tall to live in our warrens. Things sort of escalated from there. But no more! The years long feud has finally ended!” “Well I’m glad we helped! ITt seemed like you weren’t having a great time!” “Mmmyes! It was my wit and Charrrrrisma that helped me survive the fireballs! Also I do have an amulet of fire protection that helped me too!!” “Oh! Yeah that’ll help! That’s good!” “Have you,,, looked for us long?” “No! :) You came into the city quite quickly! We only finished the garment about 10 minutes ago. The great Weaver loomed it from scratch in about 6 hours! We have many weavers working together to finish this work!” “Let me know if you need help, I will be in town, let us know if we can host you in any way, you need only ask!” “Where should we find you?” “We are situated right in the prime spot of the city, which isnear both the gardens and the arena. ANd also should you wish more peace and quite we have our villa which is there on the island, it is a freshwater reservoir. This is a lake so it is all freshwater. But we filter it, kind of. Anyways! I shall be on my way, I have business to attend to. Farewell!” He drifts off
Chun CanXiao Her skin is kind of gray Upon closer inspection its not strictly made of flesh. It is kinda rubbery, not exactly human skin ripped off a person. Tiny repairs stitched together, the stitches dont really heal and fall out
Lymble Lugwrench Doing digging on the merchants we just met

Worried abt leaving without his wife Ajakatl “I have to work on my patient still but this is the best opportunity…” “He has a prothesis that needs fixing up, its hard to find anyone who can do repairs on clockwork.” D: we plan on coming back, you could travel with him down and we’ll come back “Oh sure as in bring him on the boat?”
Keeper of Swarms, hi
SK: Teij Nelsi isnt my leader. But if youre taking my doctor with you, i might as well go. I can be of use. Not that i trust you. Maybe.
Ter Cibar comes in to chat with latro
T: ok so back in Sthira. You guys have a fucking. A group of silver and gold plated guys? Is that from your country? Do you know anything abt them? L: how much gold? We don’t have a lot- its not usually put on a plate T: i dont think- L: obviously theres some where they are the plate but

L: no, they usually are made of metal, not wearing metal if theyre hunting me down. I can look into it? Unless they’re secret police, idk of them Sk: IDK either. You’re sure they’re human? T: yeah yeah Go on our journey At one point reach a canyon, a narrow chokepoint SK stops, hops off Narrows to a point it maybe fits the boat Starts conversing with the sand The trapdoor spider, huge in size, comes out of the burrow, moves to the side, lets us pass through Make it on time, disembark onto foot Arrive at the monastery at 8am The person who opened the door for us is the one who did psychic eyebeams at the fox is also here???? This person carries themselves with less authority and confidence than the one we saw in the main city. They have the same face, maintain a blankness that lets them attempt to be the same person, but this gatekeeper is a different person than whoever we saw at the capital Sk: ive only dealt with them twice, its been a different one each time. Its been 2 different people. I saw the other one in the crowd the 2nd time, idk if they rotate leadership or what
Granite: the overseer takes the faces of the monks, so you never know if you’re being watched. Why??? G: “To ensure the vow is being upheld and that we are- that everyone is always watching each other since they don’t know if they’re being watched. It creates absolute order. Some are here by choice, some are not.”
G: “The overseer believes in the power of the silent spirit. They dont speak aloud, but it shows in the writings. Not everyone believes in that cause, but all are brought here for that being or political favors to advance the standing of the monastary.” 2 ways to go longer that is past the cold The other goes back the way to go Teij could you warm up the room Yeah sure Ghosts up aheadWoman in fancy bridal-ish clothing standing above a wrapped corpse By an altar is a river that is freezing and unfreezing Ghost monk who is sitting crosslegged “You must be careful not to destablize the caverns.” Have teijnelsi stop the fire, she seems disoriented Teij: i hear the word melt in my head. D: focus on the king, you can melt him as much as you want SK: we might- if there is something trapped down here, we might benefit greatly from sending it in the direction of the king or at least entreating with it to give us advantage. I feel similar to teij, like there is something that could help Granite unsettled at ghosts, can almost remember something but keeps slipping past “These women are… what happened….” Within 2 hours, we arrive at the entrance of an old collapsed tunnel Few people + guards
Teij: they took some of the stuff out of my head when they killed my mom, but he should have an elite guard. He’ll probably be in his throneroom w the doors locked, thats where he normally is. Idk what hed be doing there, i peeked in once and he was still there, but hed come back through the front door. I know some spots to sneak through the building but i was childsized last time, so we’ll see if they still work. He’ll probably have some elite guards stationed in front. Hes rarely anywhere else at least when i was a child. If we keep a guard alive, he’ll know where Atlak Xitlati is.” Level 8

But seriously ive worked for him for possibly longer than youve been alive, i know when hes serious. This is serious. I dont trust that anyone here is here in teh best interest, they would have come themselves. Theyd come to a king who hides himself? G: yes They wouldnt come bc he HIDES G: they were here this morning Dolore basically 1v1s the king GODDAMN He seems to have been looking into a pool of scrying With 6 different screens Body crumbled leaving soul of fire. Squishy beating Thing This is the essence of the source of fire for the elemental lord of fire. Which is. Transferable. Unlike what he believed. Sk: i would put that away. It… if you eat it, you will begin to become one of them. After our exposure to the soul of fire, we now have access to adopted ancestry ifrit, can take anything off ifrit, making us more like him
Level 9 also Explore a little bit Theres some sort of. Occurrence happening outside Fox guy there “I have a new job!” “So. i have a boss. And they dont. Want. they cant directly interact w you but they want to give you stuff and tell you things. So my job is to go get messages and also spy on you. And i bring you back stuff and hints. Actually just straight up info. Pass on questions to them. Like basically being an intermediary. This is so high reward low effort, i can just hang out. But i figured this was better than taking candy from a baby where i like lure sunny away i guess. Money? Can be exchanged for goods and services. They can get you money for the currency of any continent. Stuff like that. They said their interests- they like, this was like 10 mins ago and handed me a scroll. I can’t, like, get this far the country by myself, im not that good. They said your interests align, they want to help you eliminate the other five. Idk what that means, but.” “I was like. Gonna wait for you guys to be done. And then walk behind to wherever your camp is, i can hunt i guess. I dont want to earn my keep, i figured passing info would be enough so that i didnt have to do labor. If i had to- hunt a rabbit or whatever, i can make that happen.” Do we get to like, know a name for your new employer?
“Theyre called The Wanderer?” Oh youre fucked. “Its an offer i cant refuse.” You can join sure whatever What would the god of everything want for the god of minor things? Lets start with beginner thoughts “Yeah i learned counting, theres 5 of them left. Oh thats crazy, this is turbo treason.” Not treason, he wasnt a king “Yknow what, real. Im taking that as fact.” “I get the vibe they dont get along, thats probably why they want to kill the other ones. Thats obvious tho. Some kind of metal elemental creature “Well thats unfortunate. I suppose i should shut down operation?” Probably, what was this for
“The um. Atlak son Teicneltiqui Xitlati was um. Losing dishonerably, so they rigged the tournament for metal weapons bneing the only reliable thing. In only to give advantage to local populace, we arranged a trade deal with the xitani boy.” Its over, you can provide it to the local populace “Ehhhh.” Threats “I do like this body…” Do it this time, there is a good deed that follows you “May i send to my employer?” Not the king? “No we’re cotnractors, we worked for… one of the subsidiaries of quiestus incorporated” Did he already pay? “Yknow, he did” Then give to his people, fulfill the contract “As the contract stipulates, make in the castle, leave in the castle.” “Its kind of expensive to run, but good business. We’ll change it to a not soul forge. That way we get the special quality that quiestus approves.” “We burn the soul to make the sword.” SHUT IT DOWN “Its not much, not like the scrying bowl he has. Thats half a soul a day. Ours is a 10th of a soul month” “IT PRODUCES MANY WEAPONS. RUN VERY HOT.” Wheres quietus incorp?
“Ferreus.” We could go there
“Its common of the Seven Primordial Lords.”
“Oh like the warriors of stone, he strips the soul, puts it in a stone construct. Sthira.” We met one “You talked to it?” It had a conscience “I didnt know it knew how to do that.” How long has the forge been running? “No longer than a year.” We let the silver miners leave

After Korina Demaki and Panache wake up from having fainted (hm…), they concede and King Towani is crowned the rightful king All the outlanders are invited to engage in the festivities during the coronation that same night, we accept! We are essentially teleported to an extradimensional space, a beachside tavern with a crafting workshop attached
Its ya boy D'Volta Aomar D’Volta kidnapped us Kidnapped by one direction D: “Good job killing a king.” Gr: “Uh. where are we. what happened” AE: “It was mostly Dol’Ore” D: “Well, still, group effort, you’re still culpable by the other courts.” D: “I’m your employer and it is also my priority as captain of the metaphorical ship. And do’t worry, I’ve gone through the effort to make sure you won’t be executed by the courts.” AE: “That’s appreciated” GR: “We got our ship back from the merfolk?”
D: “No, we’re working on it. However, you have been tasked by someone who I should not name, but I will name as The Wanderer, with assassinating the Seven Primordial Lords.” Ae: “Yeah we saw that thru the scrying thing” GR: “So our payment is..” D: “You don’t get executed.” Gr: “We help you kill othjer lords…” D: “Correct.” Gr: I thought this was just an expedition D: It was. But then they started threatening to invade our land, and we have to deal with that. These people are very hated by their people, typically sacrifice hundreds of souls per day. Gr: “Which elemental? I thought we were good w the fire” D: “You killed the old one half a day ago! THe new king isn’t the elemental lord!” Gr: “oh.” Ae: “Yeah I mean I’m down” D: “Theres’ that go getter attitude!!! Unfortunately, support will need to be cut off from here out. I recommend going to the metal land, the elemental lord there is widely hated. You could kill him in the streets and they’d cheer. Of course, we won’t be able to provide support at this juncture. If you want support, the Wanderer has allowed ships to go through once you deal with the elemental lord of water. We will be working together, I’ll be working form the rear while you take the front to establish a monarchy. He is also offering the chance to become lords of your own realm if you choose. This place is ruled by the elemental lords, it needs it to function, and the Wanderer is allowing you the opportunity to take over a section if you so choose.”
Grim is super not on the Maronda Shipping Company payroll lol Hes a stowaway, hid in a bucket of produce. Hes so beautiful to me Ae: I’m down to take care of the other shitty elemental lords D: Sick D: Anything else? Comms will be sparse M: Should we use the slab D: yeah my secretary will get back to you Ae: Why would it be sparse D: (brain blast). So im sure you understand Ae: uh not really. But okay. Yay. NEW GUY
“Hello, I’m Aziel Raz. Nice to meet you all.” :3 Human champion Got hired as hopefully our LAST replacement What do we see? Long braids, black man, dressed in semi-casual clothing with full plate over it (swag), about 5’5”, carrying a large sword and shield with him to the side. D: “He seems quite jazzed about liberating people and souls.” Az: “I am.” Ae: “Welcome to the crew” NPC Sorting: Part 2 Swarmkeeper?
Knows abt the Ferreus place “Lets go somewhere more private. You have certainly gained my trust.” (dejectedly, italian) Lowers his hood, revealing that he is an automaton of gold filigree and porcelain. The gold has been overgrown and replaced with plant fibers, bark filling the gaps as his body deteriorates. He’s half metal/porcelain, clearing supposed to be fancy, half overgrown plants using wood and vines to fill in the less critical parts. Recent repairs evident, arm has solid steel beams put in.
Latro is making sure his body doesn’t completely fall apart “I’m-a from Ferreus. I don’t have a real body. I am a soul in a metal shell.” Ae: “That counts as a body!”
“I guess. It’s hard to see it as mine when the Quaestus Corporation is the only one that can make new parts.” D: We’ll just have to get hte blueprints when we kill the guy
Sick. I am in the employment of a powerful entity in Ferreus, he is the Steward of the Wilds, he has been regrowing big sections of the blighted landscape of Ferreus and I hope to free him from confinement. Obviously, it is not my preferred country to be in, the people of the forest don’t always respond kindly to Quaestus’s creations. I have been working towards freeing some of the other trapped spirits of nature. Ae: DIdnt it go bad last time you guys did this They were’tn always so angry. She was a phoenix at some point, if she is something else… Being trapped in a tree and being used as a food source for a couple thousand years, I can’t imagine it’s great for the mind, even if you are a spirit of rebirth. D: YOu’re being honest with us, we’ll be honest with you, we plan on stopping the elemental evil in the lands SK: sick i want to free the spirits, that’d be cool D: yeah we’ll start w the lords and get there. We could try weakening the spirits until they’re just exhausted. If we kill the lords first, it might calm the spirits’ anger, the lords would already be dead. This could work! D: swag, come with us then SK: ok, I will be in a lot of danger if I go there. I’d figured you would want a guide. My presence will grant you access to the forest area where my patron sleeps. They don’t LIKE me being there much, but I think we could work something out. I don’t stay there for a long time bc I know I’m not welcome. Do you want a map of the area? D: ya
Working map: “There are factories and uh.. Magic rail lines but it’s metal because everything is metal there.” D: Like a rail cart SK: “yeah but big” Top section is a swamp, slowly growing the forests. The mountain range protects the encroaching desert. Big dark circles are ruins and factory and ruins and factory on top of each other. They have real cities near them, but they are mostly dangerous, self sustaining strange factory lands. Largest city in the bottom left, that is where most of Quaestus’s business are. They have a sister city across the cut in the world. THey have some bridges, but they are heavily controlled. Giant blighted land in the bottom right where they took all the soil, nothing can grow there now. They drained all the resources. Some of the religious people consider it a holy site and have temples in there. Good place to hide. Little bit of land that exists, religious city in the bottom right. Has water. Big scrubbed canyon desert in the middle that is starting to be revitalized. Section covered in trees is very hostile to all things metal. They are fighting and pushing nature back, Quaestus’s competing companies in sister cities are in the isolated rocky mountains/grassland area. They don’t let just anyone live there. They are not draining the land quite as fast. They are the same as Quaestus, different hat. THey would jump at the chance to take his place. I can get us into that city on the very right D: What are the actionable items we need to do there
Idk kill Vergo Quaestus D: theres steps tho right Yeah D: we might need a very beuatiufl woman, or maybe a man if likes men! Not that there’s anything wrong with that! Does he like anything else besides money? Idk he owns my body. I have not been there in a long time D: what would you do to kill him Fill his house with bees D: not actionable. Uh, we’ll probably have to access his company? Idk I can only really do terrorism because he will look at me and go oh that is an angry automaton back to haunt me, I better smite that thing I mean he can die the same way the other guy did. Maybe we will need to find someone closer to him to find exactly what weaknesses he has, but that would be in his corporation. You could go right to the main city and kill him in his sleep, or you could go about it more in an intel way. G: Is there a metal forge competition, is there anything he comes out for his people for? He does trade deals, he likes parties in his name, likes to show off his wealth. There’s the rails, a thing to note D: I think we start with the infiltration and then find our way. We have next to nothing to go off of. NPCs we are bringing
Teij Nelsi
Teicneltiqui Xitlati
Granite
Keeper of Swarms
Latro + Ajakatl
Lymble Lugwrench
Antheia
Emotional Support Zetogeki (watches the kids)
Chun CanXiao (watches us) Fox boy (kind of forced to come) Ex-captain whose back we ripped off Tlentetl 50 HP (changeling)
Ter Kuat NPCs we leaving behind The Literlal Children
Svodrird Dawnbrand (helps people here)
Tiachia
Poliulius’s mom
Elder Nelsi and Seer Nelsi King Toani (duh) Tlentetl 20 HP
Ter Cibar is going home to Sthira to try to convince the freedom fighters that things are bad enough there that they need to let his boyfriend Ter Kuat back in
Jatunyana people (we are hiding from them)
Thari Tajir and Bodyguard
Exigo, Mutata, and Other Guy (Haeream i think) Baby Coatl

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-20.ht.title: Session 20
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-20.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 19
Next Session: Session 21
Willowshore Going to investigate the dead woman Vaguely recognize her Similar situation to last time, looks like strangulation but was a heart attack, death from fear About 3am it happened The buried necklace is back. Not in the graves anymore, left in a basket nearby If the ghost were inside the necklace, would be able to see it. This thing is cursed by deep hatred but is unlikely the source of the hatred Kavi: shizuka maybe you need to talk to your aunt please Shizuka: yeah no i am. Very concerned
Zhu goes to tend to the corpse, Elizeth Candora offers to help but he says no She somberly plays her flute alone
Aunt’s house Yun Mong-un She’s just gotten up “Oh! Good morning! Youve stayed out late! Can i get you anything?” Teas good Kavi: sorry if we’re interrupting, its a bit important “I figured it was shizuka visiting, she lives here” Sh: something happened and idk what to do. Do you recognize this necklace? “Umm… vaguely? Its bridal jewelery from, what, a couple decades ago?” Sh: at least i know this belonged to my parents. This was. Um. and it is- cursed??? Um. and. Um. do you remember a little bit ago when that woman was found hanged at silvermist? “What???” Sh: yeah. Okay. theres a lot going on. Ok i dont want you to freak. So please don’t. Kat: you might want to take a seat? Sh: um. A few weeks ago one of the hunters was found hanged in one of the cabins. “Thats terrible.” Sh: yeah. Um. “Is that were you grew up?” Sh: thats where i lived with my parents. She… looked like me. Not identical, half elven, short brown hair, skin like mine. “We met once or twice. When she was your age she looked almost exactly like you.” Sh: it happened again. Another woman in town was hanged. This time in public. Um. “Awful.” Sh: we found the necklace there. The necklace- idk if you remember, that festival when we visited my parents i visited it with them “I thought you got it from your friend’s sister.” Sh: it was there. Where she was hanged. “So we have a grave robber that’s killing young women? We should take it to the guard right away.” Sh: i dont want anyone to panic. Thats the last thing we need. “If they die thats worse, you cant come back from dying!” “Im assuming its her wedding necklace- shizuka have you told your friends about your circumstances, itll open up the whole can of worms. I didnt even know we had a half sister until the governor needed someone to put shizuka with when she died.”
Sh: my mom was an affair baby, i grew up there with them. They died i was 15? Ish? I had no one. I had the hunters at the Silvermist Lodges but thats not what a 15 year old needs. So the governor came and scooped me up and brought me to town to introduce me to my aunt who i didnt know existed. I like to think we’re doing better than we were, it was tense at first. “It was a little bit of a surprise tbh.” Sh: i dont blame you. But like. It was kinda a surprise for all parties involved. Im assuming this necklace came from my father to my mother. “Is there a chance that your father… cursed your mother?” Sh: i dont think so?? They loved each other. “Who else did she have- a suitor? Scorned? Have you talked to anyone at the lodges that knew they were alive?” Sh: not about this. “Again, i… passed her on the street, but i didnt know she was my sister before she was already dead. Anything that happened during her lifetime isnt smth i know much about.” Sh: did grandma- idk what im saying.
Dr Damihansig Mababangloob did the autopsy, they went hunting one day, were found ripped to shreds by some kind of large wild animal. Sh: i still dont know what did it. “It hadnt happened again. No ones killed anything that big ever again.” Sh: we’ll let you know if we need to report this “I mean… alright.” Kavi goes to get zhu Going to the lodge to find someone “Eurrrr” <- we spend the next 30 mins losing our shit over bondage grandpa “Oh shizuka its been so long since i saw you” “What can i help you with?” Sh: i came to ask if you… could answer any questions abt my parents? Sh: i guess we can start off with this (necklace) do you recognize this? “Your mother’s from her wedding?” Sh: seems like it “Your parents were very much in love.” Sh: so there wasnt anyone who- idk how to say this. There wasnt anyone else that i- i guess- threatened their relationship? “I dont think so? We’ve had our fair share of arguments over the years, no one i know that tried to get between your parents.” Sh: um. No one tried to get in the way. They had a healthy relationship, ik i saw it through tinted glasses “Yes they bonded. Bc of being abandoned by their parents, both of them.” Sh: i feel like i remember that year Kat: do we know anything abt their parents? “We do now! The amount of babies in baskets in this town is astronomical!” Sh: yeah my dad was also abandoned “There was no one alive on your dads side, or you wouldve gone with them!” Kavi: she was taken in by the governor, did he know her before that?? “Someone mustve told him who you were related to, so they could place you with Yun Mong-un.” (discussing if shizuka’s aunt is her aunt fr)
Zhu: i know someone who’d know. (walks to Granny Hu)
On the way pass by kavi’s dad Rajul Samudra who looks worse for wear Granny hu’s house is starting to decay, cobwebs, bigger than memory, looms. Attuned enough in changes to the world to notice. Looking around, find her personal diary (full list will be provided later) Find her safe hidden under floorboards, documents physically feel bad abt what they represent
A lot of things here. Find that around 9 months before shizuka’s mom wouldve been born, Nadoya Sanmi paid a large sum of money to gov officials for medicines that would prevent or end pregnancies. Reported the baby to be still born to explain where it went. The doctor at the time wouldve been You So-jin
Kavi’s mom stabbed the governor that built the dam to death. They never found the body, but she has eyes everywhere. Saw it happen, reported it in, her correspondence back and forth to main city is a lot more casual abt her than what their dad made it out to seem. It seems that Cho Ming Sha is gonna do the same thing to their mom that happened as what happened to ‘the painter’.
The dead alchemist Hwo Tian-Zhe was in town for the bombing of the dam and then came back years later Number of frustrating paragraphs abt not being able to blackmail zhu, god dammit why doesnt he care Going to You so-jin’s house “Oh hello! Where’s- is my son ok?” Oh hes fine dw “Oh sweet, thank god. I thought he turned to evil again.” “The monks warned me there was darkness within him. Anyway. Tea?” Her house has a LOT of silver. Silver shards. All can determine shes making bombs. Meant to hurt undead. Anti ghost bombs. “Ok what can i help you all with? Talk about your feelings?” “Im glad youre still alive and supporting my son?” Zhu: of course. You did the abortion or delivery for one nadoya sanmi? “She had like 6 kids.” Zhu: any still borns? “No.” Sh: any memory of still borns in town? “Not me, im pretty good at what i do.” Sh: i trust. “Not that im saying im the single decider of birth. But. i think most of nadoya’s kids grew up. Why do you ask?” Sh: is yun mong-un is actually my aunt?
“Oh! Are you asking about your grandma?” Sh: yes? “Yes! She delivered a healthy baby. More than 1. 2. Years apart due to the passage of time.” Sh: but my mother was hers? “I delivered her. She had the cutest little ears. Idk why, your grandma seemed shocked by this.” Shes Very smart, but when it comes to understanding other people she is extremely unaware. A lot of technical knowledge Sh: yeah thats what we’re asking, sorry about being cagey “You were?” Sh: idk what i was even being. Its been a long day “She was a healthy baby. I didnt hear much about her after she was born. I figured shed live on the other side of the river. With her new baby. They seemed like a really happy family. It was really nice that nadoya was also there after the birth. Your grandma’s husband was busy, so she went to support your grandma so she wasnt alone.” Sh: did you report the birth? Keep record? “I keep my own notes? But. baby. Its kinda obvious. The government census, theyll just come to your house. Less work for me. I was ready to go meditate.” Sh: there was a report made. Of my grandmother having had a stillborn. “Huh maybe she went to a different midwife? Or a clerical error? Its a pretty bad clerical error.” Kavi: so like. You know abt guiying’s hopping situation? “He is influenced by a jiangshi, he was born to parents unrelated to them? It found him and changed him. And delivered him to the monastery,” Kavi: have you told him? “No.” Kavi: maybe you should tell him “He doesnt seem interested. He just keeps asking about his past lives. The monks were pretty clear i be pretty careful what i say lest he turn evil.” “I mean. I guess. We never saw them again. The jiangshi. If they dropped the baby off then they didnt want him, so why would they come back. I think if believes in the monastic spirit and meditates, he can overcome this. The monks says not to ask about the past lives, but this is the current one. So im sure its different. Thanks for being his friend! Feel free to take some elixirs while you go. I hope your project goes well. Genealogy is pretty interesting stuff.”
Katsu’s dad Katsuarashi Myna isnt doing too good “We cannot leave! Dont leave! We must take care of this place! We’ve let the house go to ruin!” Go to talk to nadoya tomorrow, it is late Go to many separate beds, as we’re sleeping Suddenly, feel pulled out of bed. Out of willowshore! Toward the ocean! Into a strange windowless room with a giant bell in it!
Karahai “OHHHH SPIRITS LEND ME YOUR WISDOM!! ANSWER MY QUESTIONS!” 5 different summoning circles “SPIRITS OF HIGHEST SPIRITUAL CONCENTRATION, LEND ME YOUR KNOWLEDGE BEYOND THE GRAAAAVE!” Man observing, woman in exorcists outfit, then bald chanting man Also a glowing bell!

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-21.ht.title: Session 21
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-21.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 20
Next Session: Session 22
Karahai Summoned from slumber by the exorcists, bound by the ritual in 1 spot Main exorcist, “GHOOOSTS SPIRITS FROM THE BEYOOOND, ANSWER OUR QUESTIONS! OH SPIRITS!” Compels guiying “WHO ARE YOU!” G: you guiying “NOT YOUR NAME. WHO ARE YOU SPIRIT!” G: you… guiying? Z: would you like to ask me instead “YES! WHO ARE YOU!”
Z: a man trapped in willowshore, communor of the greater spirits Z: the spirits of spirits “That is a lot of spirits! And the other two of you? S: matsuoka shizuka. Someone also trapped in willowshore. A hunter Z: fighter of the spirits? “Perhaps this is why you are the strongest presences in willowshore, of spiritual power. Ok- what. Do you want?” k: you- summoned us??? “You are haunting a site! What can we do to help you pass on!” Z: we’ll pass on in a years time, its been a 100 years. We are at year 99 “They seem to not be… perhaps some of the time theyre missing…” Z: how much time am i missing! “15 years!” Z: sounds like an acceptable margin of error! “You make a fair point!” Man in the back rolling his eyes “So you dont want anything? Youre going to keep haunting for a year?”
Z: we need the lighting of the Eternal Lantern “Ah.” Z: only then may we pass “Well.” Z: if it is destroyed it must be reconstructed “It has been made into a bell.” Z: then remake it!!! That which is done can be undone The lord: “theyre ghosts. They cant be trusted.” Z: then why summon?? The lord: “they need the warding bell to be lit here, theyre trying to make ourselves vulnerable.” Z: you cannot make a second warding bell??? Z: doing so would help us greatly K: youd be saving hundreds of souls! “What proof do you have?” Z: what would be sufficient proof? “If you can come here and take this bell from my hand, then i will believe we can melt this warding bell down and take it to the city!” Z: free me of these bonds and ill beat your ass! “Ill be in the garden when you prove yourselves” This guy has ghost touch and warding anti-ghost spells inscribed into his body to protect him Exorcists “i have 2 more questions if youre amenable.” “Why havent you moved on?” Z: we are trapped between the worlds, the fires have been smelted into bells! “How did you die?” Z: through a ritual “A ritual” Z: we know not a lot. I could tell you in return for the bell! Woman “maybe we should burn the town” Z: that typically makes the ghosts violent. And you know what a violent ghost does! W: “not if i defeat them with strength!” “Yes, i unchain you now, come back from whence you came!” We can walk around the room but cant touch anything Guy with ghost touch tattoos cannot touch us Willowshore, awake in the morning
Go find someone for items from the ritual, Matsuki
Nadoya Sanmi, she is in the store “Ah hello, who is there?”
Minhwan Sanmi “omg hi besties. Hi its me!” S: hello! “What can i help you with today?” S: we had some questions about my grandmother, actually. “Oh! What… kind of questions?” S: so. Um. you were there when my mother was born, yes? When- To grandson “i think you should go play outside.” S: you were there when my mother was born.” “Sure.”
S: according to you so-jin. You also, 9 months prior, sought out medicine to prevent and terminate a pregnancy. “Thats hefty thing to say!” S: im no narc. Im just trying to get clarity about things going on with my family. “Theyre already dead, shizuka. What clarity is there to get?” S: a lot? I didnt know anything about my grandmother “And she would like it to stay that way.” S: ok uh. Z: theres been 2 murdered women, we believe theyve been connected. People are dying. “Thats very different than just questions. Who? How? When?”
Z: the Silvermist Lodges, maybe related to a strange beast that attacks people? “Huh.” S: yeah its kinda only killing people who look like me “Oh that makes sense.” G: wdym?? “I mean. Well. um. Sometimes people have deep regrets in their lives.” K: shizukas grandmother?
“Yyyyes. You know, i tried to talk her out of walking up to the Tan Sugi Monastery. She was so ill and sickly after, she didnt last long. Idk what she did up there and i dont want to know.” “Shortly before her death, she lost her husband. He left. I presume hes still alive. She… felt that… she felt full of regret and anger at the thing that caused her life and marriage to fall apart. Shortly thereafter that person was no longer alive. Idk what god she prayed to to make the wildlife sooo aggressive. And i never asked. Bc i dont want to know.” K: Are you talking about shizuka’s grandfather? “No i’m talking about her grandmother. We dont know who her grandfather is. I’m sure he’s out there somewhere Many years after shizuka’s mother was born (right about when they would’ve died), shizuka’s grandmother went to the monastery and possibly prayed that the “thing” that ruined her marriage would go away. Shizuka’s grandmother caused her parents to die “Well, i mean with all the other ghosts coming back, it makes sense” Z: was she hateful? “Iiii still visit her shrine- a personal shrine- i put incense each day so she does not curse me in the afterlife.” Z: the hatred outlasts the hateful. K: would mind if we took a look at the shrine? “Sure, its right by my home, and the creatures ransacked my home K: has anything happened since then? “No, i had to go get a new picture after. She should be in the graveyard protected by the flute woman” S: thank you, i would like to go look at the shrine Around the shrine are a few long black hairs that are out of the places where she wouldve dusted K: we might need to visit your grandmothers grave S: uh. Yeah that might be necessary Shizuka cleans up the hairs and dust around the shrine
We go to the Graveside Manners, its undisturbed and empty of ghosts The ghost is kinda shy/hiding/unwilling to come out if its tied to the body Consult the spirits The spirits answer Where is her spirit? Where does it normally reside? “In the oooold family hoooome. But it could be luuurred out with sufficient prey!”
Yun Family Home Haunted house | 1 | original “Whoooo dares enter my home” S: matsuoka shizuka? “I dont know you!” S: are you… “You look like that little bastard chiiiild! Are you sure you arent her?” S: your daughter? “She is NOT that!!!” S: okay. Are you asking about her, though? If i am her? “Yeeeeees (yes). I dont believe you!” S: i am not her. “What else would you be doing in my home if youre not that little bastard come to claim more of my life! Youve taken everything from me!”
S: im her daughter, ive taken nothing from you! “Even worse!” S: neither of us chose to be put here! “And i will take the choice to remove my sin from this earth! I shall kill you you little mistake!” See a glimpse of a young woman in the reflection Shizuka suddenly falls asleep and we wake her up Furniture begins to rise and fall spookily Zhu sees her peeking through the wall what she mustve looked like in days like her youth “Fall asleep you stupid girl!”
(Yun Gyeong-hui) “My dearest friend will never let you get away with this!” We go collect glowing objects Half a necklace Hand made bracelet Hand knitted socks Shizuka noticed a chain of the same color that nadoya has underneath her shirt Creature has been dispelled but the root cause still needs to be addressed Go back to nadoyas “IS THAT A FRIENDSHIP BRACELET” S: ok buddy
“IM GOING TO THE SHRINE, THERE ARE LIKE 30 FOXES NOW, WE PRAY EVERYDAY FOR MORE FOXES AND IT WORKS” “Youre back so swiftly!” S: yes um. We went up to her house. “Oh no! Why would you do this! Youre going to make her angry!” S: shes already very angry “Yes but she can be angrier! Im so worried abt her being unhappy in the afterlife!” S: youre a very good friend. “I think about her all the time.” K: you think about her being angry in the afterlife? “Yes, i pray that she isnt angry and doesnt hurt anyone and is separated from her terrible husband S: um. I want her to be at peace as well. But it- and i dont mean it in a disrespectful way, it seems what youre doing isnt working. “Ill pray harder then.” S: nnnno. I also want her to not be angry in the afterlife. ‘Im afraid shell strike you down in your sleep” S: you pray for this?? “How terrible to know that shes actually back and hurting ppl. Its only gonna get worse S; well is…i dont know much about saving ghosts Z: i do. We have a ritual about saving ghosts. One final prayer “Do you? Well you did help before Z: do you have an object related to her? You will have to bury it “I have this necklace? When do we do this ritual?” Z: i need to buy some supplies “take what you need from the register” Z: any medicinal wines? “um we have regular wine” Z: i can deal with that i think. Ill go to the apothecary to get some herbs ok, explains the selection of fine imported wines. She imported them for hu and no one else can afford these Go back to the house Set up ritual circle in the old garden Bullshit what you say about what you remember fondly, written down, keep it on you for the next week We bury it together and sprinkle a little medicinal wine, steals a little With zhu’s guidance, we ritual Can see a shimmering haze see her appear as a mid-20s woman “i forgive you!” she fades away, nadoya sobs Zhu, quietly: oh shit that worked? Safe in the mindscape, half elves with brown hair
Kavis mom has a name also. Chanda Samudra Grandma Hu Gossip: We do katsu’s haunted house (will do when he is here eventually) We get the ritual process started while we go haunt ppl Level 9! Now vengeful ghosts on to haunt karahai! 2 minor powers and one major power

in the prison been hearing talks of a new warden Elkavron totally coincidentally the 5 of us get taken upstairs and meet the warden they have a ton of animal features tell us they cant fund our experiments anymore so we have to fight in the war or die right now have fun fighting a bear now! they drop a bear on us we fight it, 3 nat 1s vs 2 nat 20s (one being FULL DAMAGE roll) somehow we survived we tricked the bear into falling to its death get taken to our new quarters with a living room!
a guy named Bob the Sandwich Guy brings us 2 magical handwraps and a medicine kit to help get us healed zero heals us some we have some chats about escaping, also about the basic realities of the world learning about bones :) theyre in there somewhere
Lorena goes on a fun drain adventure someone gives us a meal with probably drugs in it, we wake up and are now level 2

Amberreach made improvised armor we went up to do another fight, taken in by the 2nd in command. actually optional this time but theyll give us armor so we said ok summoned bear fight part 2. shivdris: 1, bear: 0 go back to room, they give us armor they said theres another fight, this time for weapons even tho half the party cant use them summoned scorpion fight! mo: 1, scorpion: 0 go back again weapons/runes time for another fight!
The Warden Elkavron comes back, its a mandatory fight bear part 3: this time real actually we dont want to kill the innocent bear idris nat 20 request: can we fight people instead?? the final test is killing other prisoners, bc only half get out go back to room again we're not killing the people we fight this time, but we will be expected to before we get sent off to war the ppl we're fighting are next door to us LEVEL 3!

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-4.ht.description:

Next Session: Session 5
Amberreach talked a little abt the fight
Asra slithered into the other room, deliver apology and ask to work together to escape so we dont have to kill each other they say only if we give them half of our magic items that we get cool, ok, we give items they say btw youre probs gonna have to fight something dangerous tht they made, smth with acid next day: hydra! owie! oof oof owie we win, get back time for to rest before we escape level 5!

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-5.ht.title: Session 5

Next: Session 6
Amberreach we go for our final test :) checkmate warden we're actually jumping you! >:)
we "kill" The Warden start BOOKING it out go thru a teleportation circle break it, so they cant follow for now explore the underground living area (but not for too long) we find our way above ground!!!!!!!!!!! the hobgoblins: HOLY SHIT TREES pog the shack aboveground is a normal shack disguised for the wizards we follow the river we set up camp where do we go from here? idk we didnt think wed make it this far
plan: go to Welterglow bc Svodrird Dawnbrand has a guild that helps unfortunate ppl (and boy we are so unfortunate) the hobgobbies have realized that. oh shit theres not a lot of us out here
ms dawnbrand gives us a lecture on religion bc we didnt know abt the deities we go to sleep grass is tasty

Amberreach went scouting down the river get jumped by ogres and wargs we roleplay hydroxyzine knock out ogres and wargs we take all the ogres stuff find a note that says "theres a dangerous escapee from a war band" take it w a grain of salt bc theyre employees for the evil wizards, and they like throwing dogs the dogs are also genetic experiments we tie them up put a note on them that says if youre not nice when we see u again, we kill you
ouppy taming ft Bovlam 1 friendly ouppy, 2 neutral time to name them! level 6! :D

take some watches, set them up, in spreadsheet we do camping activities we dont have an encounter in the night next day wake up, plan to continue to follow river however comma space there is a Beast following us looks like fucked up sloth wizard experiment fast for a thing that looks like a sloth looks wounded from escape very malevolent so we decide to fight it fighting it A's laptop starts dying so we call it a night

Amberreach continue to swing at air (skinned sloth) this goes on for several minutes in game it finally dies we keep traveling down river time for camp sleepy time i hope no river pirates find us in the night uh oh river pirates! we roleplay hydroxyzine except for 1 guy qi kills 1 guy :( we will negotiate for their ship tomorrow morning new sleep paralysis demons

Next: Session 10
Amberreach we wake up pirate captain hey. considering you jumped us in the middle of the night. give us ur boat? NEVER!!! well. please? you either say yes or we take it slightly less nicely. NEVERRRRR please? NO! FUCK YOU! we're gonna take it. we're also gonna treat her better because you didnt even name her ITS 4 BOATS?? 4 for 1 deal! you can have our camp, we're gonna go take the boats NOOOO ok we take the boats we start sailing down the river salt flats whos fighting devils at 5am? OH BOY 5AM! they have been experimented on so theyre not as strong cosmo wanda i wish everyone who dies goes to hell no matter what they go back to hell we have to keep carrying our boats down the river bc of the rapids :( oh boy no more rapids! yay! LEVEL UP! lvl 7

we are getting woken by bovlam, we are being attacked, there are guys

Next: Session 22
Amberreach nothing bad happened and we didnt havent to change characters whatsoever /lie we killed the dracolisk we go to the last fucked up area cairn with sick people being forced to work under the watch of spirits theres likely a necromancer in there doing bad shit :( sneaky mr necromancer could u pleaaaaase stop necromancing pretty please? he says no im evil >:) we go ok then. get beat up freed the spirits! it'll take a week with someone who's an expert of the area to fix the necromantic vibes we go talk to the people theyre like. who. what. where. we explain what we are and our little city and that its safe for them should they want to come 80/100 are like whoa! yeah! we'll come! the other 20 are going to family/friends in the area we ask them to let us know if they hear of any druids or clerics in the area they said theyll keep us posted oh god we gotta build them houses

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-22.h.description:

Next: Session 23
Amberreach we're talking to the people that we have to take back home
we get told by Mozela Whitemount she was guard captain back in small town around the area (Prares) and she can help protect the group from normal threats as long as we take care of the big ones
then we ask if people can provide for themselves and Guinevere Thorne says her people are usually nomadic but its too dangerous to travel but they can help catch fish if we go along the river we start travelling back home we got jumped several times on the way but we can handle it now! get everybody back safely our kingdom now has 3 hexes we celebrated the first of the year! farm is actually farm we built roads failed to build a general store

Amberreach we received questies from some ppl
Dailyn and Rogziel come to us with information about a sea serpent up the coast that they can't kill it will be on our doors in about 5 days
Ubb Lugwrench says some other Lugwrenches are right by the edge of the Maiden's Plains and it is dangerous there right now can we go save them plz
look for Lymble Lugwrench
Svodrird Dawnbrand asks for help in building a shrine dedicated to The Eight but theres a whole fuckin sea serpent so that can wait love u tho girl 3 hobgoblins find out how to lure a sea serpent. it took a while. We Devise A Plan: find 10 deer (we did it) bring them to the shore (we also did it) we set up an ambush (once again. did it) we get Svodrird to cast water breathing on us just in case we ask Dalen and Rogziel to be lookouts for the big thing day 5: holy shit it actually worked zero nat 20 to set up ambush LFG we fight it next session

sea food for the whole town
let's go see if we can help the Lugwrenches we get jumped by a sentient avalanche we manage to defeat it but decide to head back bc we have a month to go help them
we're gonna go help Svodrird Dawnbrand build a shrine to The Eight

help Svodrird Dawnbrand build the shrine to The Eight kingdom turn claimed hex older halfling guy comes looking for us
Antjuan Sourton Oracle of Ancestors(?) says hes here to help restore the artifact (giant skull in the woods) return the lifeforce to the land but he needs 2 powerful casters help cyl and zero will have to do it he says he'll meet us there esp if we have smth to do before (UNDEAD DRAGONS) we go to bed and then head out get jumped by assassins we cant just kill them so lets take them home and have the guard lady watch over and stop them from being assassins
back on the road Amberreach level 9

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-27.h.title: Session 27
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-27.h.description:
Prev: Session 26
Next: Session 28
We are at the skull in Amberreach
Ritual for a week with Antjuan Sourton Vena 38 when done
Lucas Judkins showed up. Hi. The wizards want to stop Antjuan? We don’t trust him but the wizards don’t want this ritual to go through They want to make a place for undead to live so they displaced a bunch of people because they “thought nobody lived here” They did a census with Approximate Considers 100 ppl nobody Zero called Lucas a pussy We tried to be like. Hey. People live here?? We need to return the land to how it was so they can live here? And Lucas tried to offer them jobs and we were like. No? He had summoned a bunch of hellcats and dweomer cats, sicked them on us, and left We are currently fighting them. They are targeting Zero. I wonder why.

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-28.h.title: Session 28
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-28.h.description:
Prev: Session 27
Next: Session 29 Mo and Qi decide the fight is over NOW and do 3 critical hits between the two of them We win the fight <3 We discuss that maybe next time Mo does the insulting so that the enemies go after him and not Zero Zero knows you can train some creatures that are summoned but others not so much, he would have needed to train some to specifically target Zero
Qi and Mo make soup for Antjuan Sourton “Nothing bad will happen because you’ve given me this delicious soup” No more interruptions Fully complete the ritual Restore life to the surrounding area! Will take a long time for it to spread
Antjuan is originally from Welterglow Things have been downhill, a bit tumultuous Fighting over trade rights Shipping companies =) The Skull of Vitality We invite Antjuan to stay at our home bc he’s chill actually If we come across more disrespecting of the dead/sacrilege, Antjuan would love to assist Reminder on our intelligence report:
Quite a number of earth elementals all around the area of the map where Lymble Lugwrench is Antjuan saw intelligent humanoid ones He thinks they’re quite sturdy Can’t poison or bleed Some, if they’re not touching ground, they move slowly Get him to contact a friend who might be able to get us more info on the elementals He hates the wizards
We’re the Council of Amberreach Back home Vena 41 Make that scroll of sending Research on humanoid-like elementals that Antjuan mentioned A group of stone elementals (Genies) = elementals and also people. Jabali = earth genies. Stone abilities, very powerful (tho one of the kings or great merchants would give us problems, but a concerted effort of normal jabali would beat us up) Possible others, many giants have kin with stone so that might be an issue
Crystal beasts around? Summoned from the Plane of Earth. Don’t have minds, per se, but could be a problem. Struggle with sonic type attacks, a knife will bounce off If crystal dragons that will be an issue Ancient dragons + swarms + beings who are an entire desert, not be great! There’s not a lot of surprises w earth stuff (even undead made of earth) Someone makes an act of evil soo bad that the earth they walk on turns evil Sonic, area, and bludgeoning are common for weakness

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-29.h.title: Session 29
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-29.h.description:
Prev: Session 28
Next: Session 30
Before we head out on our Adventure, we are Approached by Nimble Lugwrench Vena 42 “We have something we want to show you! Come with me and don’t ask too many questions!” Uh. ok! They built us a house!! Fishing expedition is taking long, Eliana’s parents
Send a message to Tobias “Strange tides, should be fine, if not back in a week, worry. Currently, north-west of village, up near where the cliffs start.”
Talk to Eliana Let her know her parents are ok, will keep in touch with her Next time we’re in town, bring her and her parents a house-warming present
Talk to Margaret and Komri Closed quarry nearby
Dailyn, Rogziel, and Guinevere Thorne not here Babyshower soon! Baby born in like 7 months The Lugwrenches are holed up in the largest building of an area, difficult to miss Fellow comes up the dirt path
Palen Stonepetal
Circle of Stone, friend of Antjuan Sourton
The activities of the Viridian Venom have left him devoid of magic There isn’t enough energy from nature to let druids do magic without making it worse There’s a small presence of magic near here, but everywhere else is empty
Many druids have fled to The Grove of Cycles
There’s a sacred formation in the north-ish of the Maiden's Plains, taken by force by the wizard lords Might be the sight of power
He’s going to go to the druid’s cave nearby, we ask Taslak Ronim to accompany him to make sure that he gets there and back safe
We travel across The Plains Made By The Maiden and get to the area which is supposed to be near where Lymble Lugwrench is Vena 44 Small abandoned village, people are visible over the top of the buildings Stone giants! Largest building seems to be a church in the center of town, highest concentration of giants 5 around the church, 4 in front of one entrance and 1 in front of the other Qi sneaks in to scope out the situation, see who we’ve got to save, and maybe lure one away to fight them. 6 ppl Pink person oversees 5 small creatures (Bald pink wizard) All have a little table, tiny hands are doing very delicate work Inserting stones into relic type items?
Kobold, human child, halfling woman, Lymble is also there, and a dwarf - We manage to lure all 5 giants away to a clearing! - We fight them and finish next week A REMEMBER HE’S GONNA USE STONE SHAPE ON HIS TURN, 2 ACTIONS (SAY THIS TO A)

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-30.h.title: Session 30
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-30.h.description:
Prev: Session 29
Next: Session 31 Continue combat We beat them!!! Return to Da Church Mo kicks the door down Wizard gone. And the relic items. Wuh oh!!! Everyone is here!
Skoroli Cavebraid is the dwarf
Lymble Lugwrench is here THERE IS A WIZARD LUGWRENCH!!!!!!!!!!! WHAT THE FUCK They’re all sick…..
Callos might need a lift Trip back takes 3 days Baiary 2 when we get home
Part of the stones the people have been working with have been merging into them, bringing half their bodies to exist here and on the Elemental Planes Elizabeth
Callos of Elderport 9 years old
Vhaalzok the Kobold There’s a clan near-ish here, they’re in what is now the swamp area Astrologer by trade “Nice feet. I lost my feet in the war. I have prosthetic feet now.” Lymble doesn’t know who exactly is the traitorous Lugwrench Cousin Is the reason the Lugwrenches are getting captured
Higher up wizard than the salamander lady (or same level, she’s under Elkavron)
Ubb Lugwrench Might know who it is, but Lymble doesn’t seem convinced that he remembers all his grandchildren She’s a merchant by trade, and the wizards knew her trade route Took her south to a weird rock formation, then sent her to that church Think they were looking for something in the area
We get her to help with the Welterglow trade agreement Send a message to Ubb
Replies back. “Nothing new, a few people showed up. Dailyn Rogziel should be home soon, as well as a fishing boat.” Skoroli
Small mining town at the base of mountains of Amberreach and Fallencall Attacked by wizards recently Talents are in metal working Happy to be in the city He’s gonna give us indoor plumbing

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-31.h.title: Session 31
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-31.h.description:
prev: Session 30
next: Session 32 Arrive back home Number of our friends have made progress on our home
Bring the new people to Yaffle Lugwrench Yaffle is so busy No assistance :(
Krendak fell into the well :( He’s fine, but his book got soggy
Skoroli Cavebraid recognizes Margaret and Komri Eliana No word from her dads
Message to Tobias
Receive back: Taken by shark man somewhere near western wreck. Send rescue. Send love Eliana.
Palen Stonepetal and Taslak Ronim are back Discovered some interesting writings that may help Gist of it is that there are sites of power associated with each circle of druidic magic and if they were just not doing well or not flourishing it would be fine, but in this case the wizards have found each place with powerful magic associated with those circles and corrupted and reversed it So instead of a sacred place of natural energy, it actively takes away any kind of magic associated with it They were able to find an appropriate place tied to each circle and conducted various rituals on them We already found one and reversed it, but there should be several more He believes the one we found was associated with leaf druids There’s gonna be a number of other ones, and there may be more sites associated with leaf druids. His guess is it was related to leaf order, but could’ve been related to divine magic
He used to be part of a circle that had a stone monument (set of stones) in the center of the Maiden's Plains (the crystalline area) The ritual done to do it has basically gotten rid of natural spirits in the land Once the monument is restored he might be able to take the fleshed-to-stoned ppl and help them The investigation into the mine was a success They didn’t get any objects out of the mine, but it was investigated! 2+ giant lizards 1 possibly friendly, the other able to cast illusory spells Send Margaret to assist Yaffle Shark wizard Confident Tends to put himself in situations where he has the advantage because it’s in water He’ll almost certainly set us up in a situation where we’ll have to fight him in water or adjacent to a source of water Can also make water Mostly does water based magic, as well as magic that enhances his abilities Minion haver, but mostly aquatic creatures since he can talk to them Message to Rogziel and Daiylin Held Captive, kinda? Crystal dragon, wants to know where you guys are, but we won’t. We’re just sitting here. At river fork. Not pressing? Takes 6 days to find them 2 dragons who rise to look at us when we arrive Mother seems annoyed but at her son Son approaches and apologizes for attacking us and checking to see what human faction we belonged to and assumed we were wizards Im crying this is so cute… Gives us his allowance???? Has to study his common workbook everyday to remember the right words before trying to eat humans “I should ask hello, how do you feel about the lord of beasts?” “Mom says that because you spared your life, I owe you a mortal debt”
Sonarril and Tazzyr Went into the forest and asked if people were associated with wizards, and those are dead
They could’ve been allied with the Wizard Lord of Dragons
Somewhere near the Lord of Runes, she thinks
There’s an elemental one too If the wizards have found the ability to, at will, harness and forcing fiendish or celestial energy on mortal beings, she says to be worried about being contacted by extraplanar beings Their experiments are typically upon beasts, or altering the natural landscape She wonders if they had a patron or sponsor, and what they're using it for, since it seems to have succeeded They could do it to other people or creatures Keep an eye out, be cautious She’d be surprised if fiends weren’t near you, already She is suspect of there being activity near their burrow We could send Tazzyr as a scout If we have any children/adults we want to send in exchange for her son for training MAKE A LIST OF ITEMS TO BUY Qi - 2 Common, 1 Uncommon, Total 1440 GP Encompassing Lockpick - U - 450 GP Bracers of Missile Deflection (Greater) - C - 650 GP Boots of Bounding - C - 340 GP Cyl - 1400 GP Helm of Underwater Action - 900 GP Lover’s Gloves - 500 GP Zero - 55gp 5 potions of Water Breathing

sessions/wizard-experiments/session-32.h.title: Session 32
sessions/wizard-experiments/session-32.h.description:
prev: Session 31 Zero notices that everyone is so busy and stays behind in town
Xakha little rat investigator/alchemist
Wizard is near a temple of Pelagus Fors Half submerged in sea water, at one point there was some sort of dam or containment wall, but it’s been broken to flood it Qi carries Xakha who is a tiny rat pest form creature over the water to get a closer look at the blobs the party saw in the water Qi gets chomped by a Megalodon Welcome to Hell.

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
